entries.description: This category, <strong> Cementitious Decks and Underlayment</strong>, contains the sites related to the following areas: <strong>03500 Cementitious Decks and Underlayment</strong> <ul> <li>03510 Cementitious Roof Deck <ul> <li>Cementitious Wood Fiber Plank <li>Gypsum Concrete Roof Deck </ul> <li>03520 Lightweight Concrete Roof Insulation <ul> <li>Composite Concrete and Insulation <li>Lightweight Cellular Concrete <li>Lightweight Insulating Concrete </ul> <li>03530 Concrete Topping <li>03540 Cementitious Underlayment <ul> <li>Gypsum Underlayment <li>Portland Cement Underlayment </ul></ul>

entries.title: Decorative_Finishes
entries.description: Concrete craftsmanship has gone through some major changes in the past few years. Unlike the standard but very trustworthy concrete of old, todays concrete has put on a whole new face. Thanks to continuing advances including innovative forming, stamping and texturing tools, new placement and finishing techniques; concrete has truly come of age. This category focuses on the many new faces of decorative concrete finishing available today. Colors, textures, patterns, and alternative practices allow concrete to be seen and used in the most interesting and artistic ways.

entries.title: Stamped
entries.description: Stamped concrete is an innovative process that replicates the look of natural stonework and masonry by applying color and texturing techniques to freshly placed concrete. Stamping concrete is an art and a science thus requiring advanced concrete placement skills as well as proper tools and materials.The process involves applying texture and color to cast-in-place concrete using various methods and tools. The most common method is to "stamp" the pattern ortexture into the concrete when it is still in a semi-plastic state by using "concrete stamps". These stamps are either rigid (similar to a cookie cutter that creates a pattern only) or are in the form of a "stamp mat",(usually made of rubber or hard plastic) that is used to create a pattern and texture. The stamps are usually applied to concrete that has been colored in various ways to help the craftsman achieve the overall effect. The coloring is often enhance or antiqued during the stamping process by the addition of secondary coloring. This created the authentic look of real stone, brick, textured tile, or granite. Stamped concrete has all of the durability and longevity of standard concrete and is often more durable due to the hardening additives that are commonly used in the coloring process and the addition of high grade concrete sealers.

entries.title: Precast
entries.description: Precast concrete is manufactured from stone, sand and cement to form a variety of construction materials. Sites may include those related to CSI Division 3 area for <strong>03 40 00 Precast Concrete</strong> including: <ul> <li>03410 Plant-Precast Structural Concrete <li>03420 Plant-Precast Structural Post-Tensioned Concrete <li>03430 Site-Precast Structural Concrete <ul><li>Lift - Slab Cocrete <li>Precast Post - Tensioned Concrete <li>Strucural Precast Pretensioned Concrete </ul> <li>03450 Plant-Precast Architectural Concrete <ul><li>Faced Architectural Precast Concrete</li></ul> <li>03460 Site-Precast Architectural Concrete <li>03470 Tilt-Up Precast Concrete <li>03480 Precast Concrete Specialties <li>03490 Glass-Fiber-Reinforced Precast Concrete </ul>

entries.title: Doors_and_Windows
entries.description: This category, <strong>Doors and Windows</strong> contains sites and links to categories related to the following Construction Specification Institute (CSI) numbered areas: <ul> <li>08050 Basic Door and Window Materials and Methods <li>08100 <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Materials_and_Supplies/Doors_and_Windows/Metal/">Metal Doors and Frames</a> <li>08200 <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Materials_and_Supplies/Doors_and_Windows/Wooden/">Wood</a> and <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Materials_and_Supplies/Doors_and_Windows/Plastic/">Plastic</a> Doors <li>08300 <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Materials_and_Supplies/Doors_and_Windows/Specialty/">Specialty Doors</a> <li>08400 <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Materials_and_Supplies/Doors_and_Windows/Entrances_and_Store_Fronts/">Entrances and Storefronts</a> <li>08500 Windows <li>08600 <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Materials_and_Supplies/Doors_and_Windows/Skylights/">Skylights</a> <li>08700 <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Materials_and_Supplies/Doors_and_Windows/Hardware/">Hardware</a> <li>08800 <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Materials_and_Supplies/Doors_and_Windows/Glazing/">Glazing</a> <li>08900 <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Materials_and_Supplies/Doors_and_Windows/Glazed_Curtain_Walls/">Glazed Curtain Wall</a>

entries.title: Decorative
entries.description: Manufacturers of window and door decorative hardware.

entries.title: Handles,_Knobs,_and_Levers
entries.description: Sites that feature handles, knobs and levers.

entries.title: Hinges
entries.description: Companies specialising in hinges and door hanging products.

entries.title: Locks
entries.description: Door Locks, Door Closers, Access Control Systems and other aspects of Door and Entrance security.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Companies that provide door and window hardware to other companies.

entries.title: Installation
entries.description: This category is for the sites of contractors whose focus is the installation of windows and doors.

entries.title: Overhead_Doors
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of overhead doors which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities.

entries.title: Plastic
entries.description: This category contains manufacturers and distributors of PVC and Fiberglass windows. Other types of polymer based windows may also be listed here. If you are looking for thermally efficient windows, and can accept limited color offerings, vinyl windows are a good choice. Some manufacturers now offer co-extruded and painted vinyl windows with more color options. Some brands have wood grain foils available for a wood look interior. Fiberglass windows are not extruded the way vinyl and aluminum windows are, but"pultruded" through heated dies. This process is slow and expensive, but the technology is improving and the number of manufacturers producing fiberglass windows is increasing, so prices may begin to come down. Fiberglass is stronger than vinyl, making them well suited for commercial construction and homes with larger openings. Some benefits of plastic windows are: 1. They have approximately the same insulating value as wood. 2. They do not warp or rot. 3. They can be expected to perform consistently well throughout their lifespan. 4. Many vinyl windows employ welded seams, making them tighter and less likely to leak. Some drawbacks of plastic windows are: 1. Vinyl window colors are often limited (usually, white is all that's available) 2. Painting vinyl windows is difficult, if not impossible, to do by the average homeowner. 3. Fiberglass windows are expensive. 4. Fiberglass cannot be welded (at least not with current technology).

entries.title: Sealants_and_Weather-Stripping
entries.description: Products designed to protect the inside of buildings and other structures against water infiltration and thermal loss or gain.

entries.title: Specialty
entries.description: This category is for sites related to specialty doors and windows.

entries.title: Air_Curtains
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of loading dock equipment . Products listed will typically include dock bumpers, dock levelers, dock lifts, portable ramps, bridges, and platforms, seals and shelters, and truck restraints .

entries.title: Stained_Glass
entries.description: This category is for business sites related to stained glass windows and/or doors.

entries.title: Electrical
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of electrical materials and/or supplies which are supplied directly to public authorities, commercial contractors or any other organization directly involved in the construction and maintenance industry . The category has been subdivided into a number of specific subcategories and we would ask that you take the time to review the subcategory descriptions to determine if your site is appropriate to that category or subcategory

entries.title: Lighting
entries.description: Commercial lighting product companies only, for use by construction industry.

entries.title: Accessories
entries.description: Sites listed here will primarily distribute or manufacture a range of accessories for commercial lighting products for use by construction industry. i.e. lamps, ballasts, dimmers, transformers, etc.

entries.title: Ballasts_and_Starters
entries.description: Electric and electronic components that are directly connected to a luminaire, and support or initialize the operation of its specific light source.

entries.title: Bulbs_and_Sources
entries.description: The lamps, tubes, and ballasts category is a subcategory of lighting dedicated to light bulbs and accessories suppliers

entries.title: Electroluminescent
entries.description: A technology that transforms electrical energy almost directly into light, usually applied with film materials.

entries.title: Fluorescent
entries.description: Light sources in fluorescent technology, including the traditional tubes and the newer compact fluorescent lamps.

entries.title: LED
entries.description: Light Emitting Diodes are a relatively new technology, which creates light directly at the molecular level, and doesn't require high temperatures or voltages.

entries.title: Neon_and_Cold_Cathode
entries.description: Light sources in a special variety of the fluorescent technology, usually produced in small series or as custom products.

entries.title: Lenses_and_Louvers
entries.description: Products that are used to enhance light fixtures by focusing or dispersing the output beam, or to protect either the luminaire from damage, or the viewer from glare.

entries.title: Components_and_Parts
entries.description: Sites listed here will primarily distribute or manufacture components and parts for commercial lighting products for use by construction industry. i.e. lampholders, adapters, reflectors, compact fluorescents, lenses and diffusers.

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: This category will list companies that provide engineering services to the Lighting industry.

entries.title: Luminaries
entries.description: Companies who manufacturer a standard product range which is cataloged for trade use.

entries.title: Commercial_and_Industrial
entries.description: Lighting systems that are used in offices, commercial sales facilities, factories and other places where high robustness is required.

entries.title: Emergency
entries.description: Companies who make or assemble light fittings used by the construction industry for emergency purposes. i.e. strobes, flashers, stack lights, etc.

entries.title: Exterior
entries.description: Lighting products that are generally installed outside of buildings, like in road or park lighting.

entries.title: Fiber_Optic_and_Remote_Source
entries.description: Lighting systems that transport the light to a different place than where it is created. This includes systems based on glass or synthetic fibers, or tubular systems coated with microprismatic films or other materials.

entries.title: Navigation_and_Signalization
entries.description: Lighting equipment used in traffic environments for orientation, hazard marking and other purposes.

entries.title: Public_and_Representative
entries.description: Lighting products that are designed for representative public and semi-public areas like hotel lobbies, conference rooms, auditoriums, and churches.

entries.title: Speciality_and_Custom_Made
entries.description: Companies whose main area of work is in the design and production of custom lighting products.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Distributors of lighting products that cover an international area. Local distributors should submit the URL to the Regional area. For retail suppliers, go to Shopping/Home and Garden/Electrical/Lighting .

entries.title: Used_and_Repair
entries.description: This category is for all types of used, repaired or surplus electrical equipment. It is intended that the companies listed here are in the business of repairing, rebuilding, or remanufacturing of the electrical equipment. It includes (but is not limited to) motors, breakers, switchgear, and transformers.

entries.title: Elevators_and_Escalators
entries.description: Fixed mechanical equipment used to transport passengers or freight between different parts of a building. Horizontal moving walkways for passengers are listed here. Businesses manufacturing both elevators and escalators are listed here.

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: Lists trade associations and organizations related to businesses producing, supplying, operating, or maintaining elevators, escalators, and similar equipment.

entries.title: Consulting
entries.description: Lists sites for businesses offering advisory, management, engineering design, or legal services related to elevators, escalators, and similar equipment.

entries.title: Directories
entries.description: Directories of Elevators and Escalators.

entries.title: Dumbwaiters
entries.description: Lists businesses that manufacture dumbwaiters. Dumbwaiters are a form of freight elevator, often used in homes and the hospitality industry to move items such as prepared meals and groceries between floors in the same building.

entries.title: Elevators
entries.description: Lists sites for businesses that manufacture elevator systems. Elevators are mechanical equipment used to transport passengers or freight vertically between floors in a buildings or similar structure. This normally involves propelling a cage vertically within a shaft.

entries.title: Parts_and_Service
entries.description: Lists sites for businesses that manufacture parts, or provide maintenance or associated services for elevators. Sites for businesses that supply and install, but do not manufacture, whole elevator systems are normally listed here. Sites for businesses that manufacture components of elevators systems, such as cars or cabs, are listed here.

entries.title: Parts_and_Service
entries.description: Lists sites for businesses that manufacture parts, or provide maintenance or associated services for elevators, escalators, and similar equipment.

entries.title: Laundry_Facilities
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, distributors and suppliers of commercial laundry and dry Cleaning equipment . Typically products listed will include dry cleaning equipment, drying and conditioning equipment, finishing equipment, ironing equipment and washers and extractors .

entries.title: Library
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, distributors and suppliers of library equipment. Typically products will include automated book storage and retrieval systems, book depositories, book theft protection equipment and library stack systems.

entries.title: Parking_Facilities
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of parking control equipment which is supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for parking facility construction or maintenance . The category has been subdivided into a number of specific subcategories and we would ask that you take the time to review the subcategory descriptions to determine if your site is appropriate to that category or subcategory.

entries.title: Unit_Kitchens
entries.description: Unit kitchens, sometimes called kitchenettes, combine cooking facilities, sink and storage in one prefabricated unit. Some also have refrigeration.

entries.title: Furnishings
entries.description: This category, <strong>Furnishings</strong> contains sites and links to categories related to the following Construction Specification Institute (CSI) numbered areas: <ul> <li>12050 Fabrics <li>12100 Art <li>12300 Manufactured Casework <li>12400 Furnishings and Accessories <li>12500 Furniture <li>12600 Multiple Seating <li>12700 Systems Furniture <li>12800 Interior Plants and Planters <li>12900 Furnishings Restoration and Repair </ul> <strong>However</strong>, it should be noted that many sites are <strong>more appropriate</strong> for listing at <a href="/Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Home_and_Garden/Furniture/">Business: Consumer Goods and Services: Home and Garden: Furniture</a>.

entries.title: Cabinetry
entries.description: This category contains links to sites related to materials and supplies used for cabinetry. Please submit sites related to materials and supplies of cabinet furnishings including, but not limited to: <ul> <li>Wholesale and Distribution</li> <li>Manufacturing</li> </ul> <strong>ATTENTION: <em>Retailers and showroom dealers</em></strong> do <strong>NOT</strong> submit your site to this category. It will not be listed. Please redirect your submission to the local-level <a href="/Business/Regional/">Business and Economy</a> category, as appropriate.

entries.title: Commercial
entries.description: Furnishings for commercial use.

entries.title: Manufactured_Casework
entries.description: This category, 12300 <strong>Manufactured Caseworks</strong> contains sites and links to categories related to the following Construction Specification Institute (CSI) numbered areas: <ul> <li>12310 Manufactured Metal Casework <li>12320 Manufactured Wood Casework Wood - Veneer - <ul><li>Faced Casework <li>Plastic - Laminate - Faced Casework </ul> <li>12350 Specialty Casework <ul><li>Bank Casework <li>Dental Casework <li>Display Casework <li>Dormitory Casework <li>Educational Facility Casework <li>Hospital Casework <li>Kitchen Casework <li>Laboratory Casework <li>Library Casework <li>Medical Casework <li>Nurse Station Casework <li>Religious Casework <li>Residential Casework <li>Study Carrels </ul> </ul>

entries.title: Masonry_and_Stone
entries.description: This category, <strong>Masonry and Stone</strong>, contains sites related to the Construction Specification Institute (CSI) numbered area for <i>Division 4, Masonry</i>, which includes: <ul> <li>04050 Basic Masonry Materials and Methods <li>04200 Masonry Units <li>04400 Stone <li>04500 Refractories <li>04600 Corrosion-Resistant Masonry <li>04700 Simulated Masonry <li>04800 Masonry Assemblies <li>04900 Masonry Restoration and Cleaning </ul>

entries.title: Cast_Stone
entries.description: Cast Stone is building stone made from concrete. It is used in masonry construction.

entries.title: Corrosion_Resistant_Masonry
entries.description: This category, <strong>Corrosion-Resistant Masonry</strong> contains sites and links to categories related to the following Construction Specification Institute (CSI) numbered areas: <ul> <li>04600 Corrosion-Resistant Masonry <li>04610 Chemical-Resistant Brick <li>04620 Vitrified Clay Liner Plate </ul>

entries.title: Masonry_Units
entries.description: This category, <strong>Masonry Units</strong>, contains sites related to the Construction Specification Institute (CSI) numbered area for <i>Division 4, Masonry</i>, which includes: <ul> <li>04210 Clay Masonry Units <li>04220 Concrete Masonry Units <li>04230 Calcium Silicate Units Masonry <li>04270 Glass Masonry Unit <li>04290 Adobe Masonry Unit </ul>

entries.title: Greek
entries.description: Quarriers, fabricators and/or suppliers of natural stone from Greece.

entries.title: Italian
entries.description: Manufacturers and suppliers of Italian granite and marble.

entries.title: Spanish
entries.description: Quarriers, fabricators and/or suppliers of natural stone from Spain.

entries.title: Turkish
entries.description: Quarriers, fabricators and/or suppliers of natural stone from Turkey.

entries.title: Mechanical
entries.description: This category contains links for sites related to mechanical materials and supplies. Sites listed may include, but not limited to: <ul> <li>manufacturing, <li>wholesale and distribution, and <li>marketplaces. </ul> Examples of mechanical products provided by manufacturers and distributors include: <ul> <li>plumbing products <li>heating and air conditioning products </ul>

entries.title: Air_Distribution
entries.description: This category contains links for sites related to air distribution equipment and associated materials and supplies. Sites listed may include, but not limited to: <ul> <li>manufacturing, <li>wholesale and distribution, and <li>marketplaces. </ul> Examples of air distribution products provided by manufacturers and distributors include: <ul> <li>air knife systems <li>centrifugal blowers <li>axial propeller fans <li>diffusers <li>pneumatic diffusers <li>thermally powered diffusers <li>architectural lattice and perforated grilles <li>grilles and registers </ul>

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: Industry associations for all air distribution products and categories

entries.title: Dampers,_Louvers,_Accessories
entries.description: Mechanical air control devices for air distribution including dampers, louvers, doors, vents

entries.title: Fans
entries.description: Fans for the forced movement of air in a mechanical system

entries.title: Filtration
entries.description: Mechanical air filtration and particulate removal systems

entries.title: Outlet_Grilles,_Registers,_Diffusers
entries.description: Air outlet devices such as grilles, registers, diffusers

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: This category should contain General Business and Commerce Associations that deal with providing materials and supplies to the HVAC industry. This category is not for individual companies.

entries.title: Heat_Pumps
entries.description: A heat pump takes heat from its source at low temperature and discharges it at a higher temperature, allowing the unit to supply more heat than the equivalent energy supplied to the heat pump. This category is for manufacturers and suppliers of heat pumps and related equipment.

entries.title: Instrumentation_and_Controls
entries.description: Focused on manufacturers and suppliers of hardware for commercial and industrial scale HVAC control systems, not intended to cover residential climate control. Sub-category covers software for HVAC control systems.

entries.title: Controls_Contractors
entries.description: HVAC controls contractors focus on the design, configuration, installation and commissioning of HVAC digital control systems.

entries.title: Radiant_Heating
entries.description: Radiant heating materials and supplies covers a range of aspects including (but not limited to) wholesale, distribution, and manufacturing of underfloor heating systems including water and electric. Suppliers and installers of radiant heating systems can also be found here specializing in either water or electric systems.

entries.title: Organizations
entries.description: National organizations with the goal to promote understanding of radiant heating.

entries.title: Retailers
entries.description: This category is for retailers of radiant heating.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category will list companies that purchase products from Producers and Manufacturers in bulk and resell it without transformation to re-sellers. The Wholesalers and Distributors that will be listed in this category are associated with Radiant Heating. Companies that provide services to these Wholesalers and Distributors will be listed here. This category will not list Manufacturers' Representatives, Retailers.

entries.title: Boilers
entries.description: This category covers industrial, commercial and/or residential boiler sales, service, parts, and general information, and the sub-categories boiler manufacturers, and boiler directories.

entries.title: Directories
entries.description: This category lists directories of services that are related to commercial, industrial and/or residential boilers.

entries.title: Manufacturing
entries.description: Companies that manufacture industrial, commercial and residential boilers.

entries.title: Metals
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of metal products which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities. It does not include the raw product used to manufacture these goods . The category has been subdivided into a number of specific subcategories and we would ask that you take the time to review the subcategory descriptions to determine if your site is appropriate to that category or subcategory

entries.title: Cold-formed_Metal_Framing
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers, fabricators and distributors of cold formed metal framing which is supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities. Typically it will include light gauge steel framing, load-bearing metal stud systems, cold formed metal joist systems, slotted channel framing systems, and electrical, mechanical and medical support systems.

entries.title: Expansion_Control
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of expansion control equipment which is supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities. Typical products will include :Expansion Joint Cover Assemblies, Metal Plate Cover Assemblies, Strip Seal Floor Joint Covers, Slide Bearings, Bridge Expansion Joint Assemblies and Bridge Bearings Bridge Sole Plates . It does not include expansion joints used in industrial piping systems.

entries.title: Metal_Coating
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers, fabricators and distributors of metal coating materials which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities. Equipment suppliers and applicators should submit their sites to either the @linked sub categories or related category links.

entries.title: Metal_Decking
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers, fabricators and distributors of metal floor and roof decks which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities .

entries.title: Metal_Fabrications
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers, fabricators and distributors of metal assemblies and products which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities . Contractors or fabricators of industrial and non construction related goods will not be listed here . The category has been subdivided into a number of specific subcategories and we would ask that you take the time to review the subcategory descriptions to determine if your site is appropriate to that category or subcategory

entries.title: Gratings
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers, fabricators and distributors of metal gratings which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities

entries.title: Handrails_and_Railings
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers, fabricators and distributors of metal handrails and railings which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities .

entries.title: Metal_Fastenings
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers, fabricators and distributors of metal fasteners and systems used to connect metal products to metal or other materials, which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities . It does not include general nails and screws or wood and plastic fasteners. The submission location for which can be found in the related category links appended to this category .

entries.title: Metal_Joists
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers, fabricators and distributors of metal joists and joist systems which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities. Typically it will include open web steel joists, joist girders, and solid web metal joists. It may also include entities specialized in metal joist services.

entries.title: Ornamental_Metal
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers, fabricators and distributors of ornamental metal products which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities . Typical products will include ornamental stairs, prefabricated spiral stairs, ornamental handrails and railings, ornamental metal castings and ornamental sheet metal .

entries.title: Stairs_and_Ladders
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of metallic stairs and ladders which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities.

entries.title: Ladders
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of metal ladders which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities.

entries.title: Structural_Metal_Framing
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers, fabricators and distributors of structural metal framing products and systems which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities. Typically products listed will include architecturally exposed structural steel, prefabricated steel columns, tubular steel, structural aluminum, framing systems, geodesic structures and space frames .

entries.title: Site_Construction
entries.description: This category contains sites, categories, and category links to the following <strong>Division 2: Site Construction</strong> areas, including but not limited to: <ul> <li>02050 Basic Site Materials and Methods <li>02100 Site Remediation <li>02200 Site Preparation <li>02300 Earthwork <li>02400 Tunneling, Boring and Jacking <li>02450 Foundation and Load-Bearing Elements <li>02500 Utility Services <li>02600 Drainage and Containment <li>02700 Bases, Ballasts, Pavements and Appurtenances <li>02800 Site Improvements and Amenities <li>02900 Planting <li>02950 Site Restoration and Rehabilitation </ul>

entries.title: Athletic_and_Recreational_Surfaces
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers, installers and distributors of recreational and sport surfacing materials and equipment which is supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities. The category has been subdivided into a number of specific subcategories and we would ask that you take the time to review the subcategory descriptions to determine if your site is appropriate to that category or subcategory Submissions to this category are restricted to International organizations and United States organisations whose operations extend beyond state boundaries. If your organization does not meet this criteria please submit your site to the appropriate regional category.

entries.title: Turf
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers, installers and distributors of natural and synthetic turf sports surfaces which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities. Submissions to this category are restricted to International organizations and United States organisations whose operations extend beyond state boundaries. If your organization does not meet this criteria please submit your site to the appropriate regional category.

entries.title: Cathodic_Protection
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of cathodic protection materials.Contractors or consultants should place their sites in the appropriate sub categories of this category. Submissions to this category are restricted to International organizations and United States organisations whose operations extend beyond state boundaries. If your organization does not meet this criteria please submit your site to the appropriate regional category.

entries.title: Drainage_and_Containment
entries.description: This category contains sites, categories, and category links to the following <strong>Division 2: Site Construction</strong> areas, including but not limited to: 02600 Drainage and Containment 02610 Pipe Culvert 02620 Subdrainage <ul> <li>Foundation Drainage Piping <li>Geocomposite Drains <li>Geotextile Subsurface Drainage Filtration <li>Pipe Underdrain and Pavement Base Drain <li>Retaining Wall Drainage Piping <li>Subgrade Drains <li>Tunnel Drainage Piping <li>Underslab Drainage Piping </ul> 02630 Storm Drainage <ul> <li>Catch Basins, Grates, and Frames <li>Combination Storm Drain and Underdrain <li>Inlets <li>Storm Drainage Manholes, Frames, and Covers <li>Storm Drainage Pipe and Fittings <li>Water Detection Chambers </ul> 02640 Culverts & Manufactured Construction <ul> <li>Concrete Arch Buried Bridge <li>Metal Pipe - Arch Cluverts <li>Metal Plate Culverts <li>Precast Reinforced Concrete Arch Culverts <li>Precast Reinforced Concrete Box Culverts <li>Precast Reinforced Concrete Rigid Frame Culverts </ul> 02660 Ponds and Reservoir <ul> <li>Cooling Water Ponds <li>Distribution Reservoirs <li>Fire Protection Reservoirs <li>Leaching Pits <li>Pond and Reservoir Covers <li>Pond and Reservoir Liners <li>Retention Basins <li>Sewage Lagoons <li>Stabilization Ponds</ul> 02670 Constructed Wetland </ul>

entries.title: Manholes,_Covers_and_Frames
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of manholes, covers and frames which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities.

entries.title: Fences_and_Gates
entries.description: This category, Fences and Gates, is part of the Site Improvements and Amenities area of Site Construction. Links to sites may include manufacturers, wholesale and distribution, associations and allied fields, such as <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Materials_and_Supplies/Site_Construction/Fences_and_Gates">Gate Openers</a>, related to the following: <ul> <li>Chain Link Fences and Gates <li>Ornamental Metal Fences and Gates <li>Plastic Fences and Gates <li>Wire Fences and Gates <li>Wood Fences and Gates </ul>

entries.title: Irrigation_Equipment
entries.description: 'Irrigation Equipment' includes irrigation systems and accessories for the home or garden as well as civil applications. Here you will find sellers and distributors of lawn sprinkler systems, civil irrigation systems, and other irrigation equipment and parts.

entries.title: Masts_and_Poles
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of power delivery, lighting and communication masts and poles which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities.

entries.title: Lighting
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of lighting masts and poles which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities. Lamps should be placed in the <A HREF="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Materials_and_Supplies/Electrical/Lighting/Luminaires/Exterior/">Luminaires</A> category.

entries.title: Resources
entries.description: Resource sites providing general information about pavements, typically sites will be directories, FAQs, chats and forums,and publications.

entries.title: Pipes_and_Fittings
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of pipes and fittings which are supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities. The category has been subdivided into a number of specific subcategories and we would ask that you take the time to review the subcategory descriptions to determine if your site is appropriate to that category or subcategory

entries.title: Retaining_Walls
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of retaining wall products.

entries.title: Site_Furnishings
entries.description: Site furnishings include products such as benches, picnic tables, trash receptacles, planters and other furniture that is designed specifically for use in commercial and municipal applications. Site furnishings generally serve multiple purposes. They primarily add functionality to public spaces, such as places to sit or eat. They may also enhance the beauty of the areas where they are installed, or have secondary benefits. For example, large planters filled with blooming flowers may not only be attractive, but may also act as traffic barriers in the front of a building. Site furnishings are manufactured using a wide range of materials. Concrete, metal, wood, plastic, plastisol or a combination of these materials make up the majority of these products.

entries.title: Soil_Stabilization
entries.description: Products that help man in his soil stabilization efforts. Ranging from equipment to chemicals, this section will list the various companies that are marketing products for this important field.

entries.title: Erosion_Control
entries.description: Described as the application of necessary measures including artificial structures, vegetative manipulation, water control, or physical soil changes to minimize soil erosion. This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of materials and equipment which is supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for erosion control.

entries.title: Climate_Controlled_Rooms
entries.description: Sites for manufacturers, et al of special climate-controlled rooms such as saunas, wine cellars, or humidors.

entries.title: Fireplaces_and_Stoves
entries.description: This category is for sites with businesses that manufacturer or distribute fireplaces, inserts, and stoves, including accessories that don't offer online sales.

entries.title: Louvers_and_Vents
entries.description: Louvers, Vents, Louvered Equipment Screens, Louvered Sun Shading Devices

entries.title: Special_Construction
entries.description: This category may contain categories, category links, and site links related the following Construction Specification Institute (CSI) areas: <strong>Division 13 Special Construction</strong> <ul> <li>13010 Air-Supported Structures <li>13020 Building Modules <li>13030 Special Purpose Rooms <li>13080 Sound, Vibration, and Seismic Control <li>13090 Radiation Protection <li>13100 Lightning Protection <li>13110 Cathodic Protection <li>13120 Pre-Engineered Structures <li>13150 Swimming Pools <li>13160 <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Materials_and_Supplies/Special_Construction/Aquariums/">Aquariums</a> <li>13165 Aquatic Park Facilities <li>13170 Tubs and Pools <li>13175 <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Materials_and_Supplies/Special_Construction/Ice_Rinks/">Ice Rinks</a> <li>13185 Kennels and Animal Shelters <li>13190 Site-Constructed Incinerators <li>13200 Storage Tanks <li>13220 Filter Underdrains and Media <li>13230 Digester Covers and Appurtenances <li>13240 Oxygenation Systems <li>13260 Sludge Conditioning Systems <li>13280 Hazardous Material Remediation <li>13400 Measurement and Control Instrumentation <li>13500 Recording Instrumentation <li>13550 Transportation Control Instrumentation <li>13600 Solar and Wind Energy Equipment <li>13700 Security Access and Surveillance <li>13800 Building Automation and Control <li>13850 Detection and Alarm <li>13900 Fire Suppression </ul>

entries.title: Aquariums
entries.description: This category contains links to sites related to the <strong><i>construction and maintenance</i> of aquariums</strong>, including design, build, installation, and maintenance of custom-built aquariums for home and office spaces.

entries.title: Shelters_and_Booths
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of shelters and booths and associated equipment which is supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for installation in both indoor or outdoor public places. Retail suppliers should place their submissions in the appropriate Shopping category.

entries.title: Storm
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of storm shelters and associated equipment which is supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for installation in both indoor or outdoor public places. Retail suppliers should place their submissions in the appropriate Shopping category.

entries.title: Supplies
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of a general range of materials and equipment which is supplied directly to public authorities or commercial contractors for site construction activities. Typically it will include general merchants . If your company supplies a specific product or product range please search for the category which most closely represents your product and service and place your submission in that category .

entries.title: Thermal_and_Moisture
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of thermal and moisture protection products, including roofing, siding, insulation, and sealants for commercial and residential buildings.

entries.title: Dampproofing_and_Waterproofing
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of dampproofing and waterproofing products, generally for at grade or below grade use.

entries.title: Fire_and_Smoke_Protection
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of Fire and Smoke Protection products, such as cementitious and intumescent fireproofing or firestopping.

entries.title: Sheet_Metal_Roofing
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of sheet metal roofing panels.

entries.title: Insulation
entries.description: This category is for sites of manufacturers of insulation products. Installer sites should be submitted to the most concise Regional category.

entries.title: Joint_Sealers
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of Joint Sealants, such as waterstops and waterproof expansion control joints.

entries.title: Roofing_and_Siding_Panels
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of roofing and siding panels. Panels will typically be more than one layer, with structural or insulating characteristics.

entries.title: Composite_Panels
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of composite (not metal)roofing and siding panels.

entries.title: Metal_Roof_and_Wall_Panels
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of metal roofing and siding panels, other than single-ply sheet metal roofing. These panels typically have structural or insulating properties.

entries.title: Residential_Siding
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of siding products for residential and light commercial buildings.

entries.title: Structural_Insulated_Panel_Systems
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of Structural Insulated Panels (SIPs). These panels are typically wood or fiberboard, bonded to a foam insulation core. SIPs are used for construction of residential and small commercial structures, without traditional framing.

entries.title: Roofing_Tiles_and_Shingles
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of shingles and roofing tiles.

entries.title: Roof_Tiles
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of roofing tiles.

entries.title: Shingles
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of shingles.

entries.title: Tools_and_Equipment
entries.description: This category will list manufacturers, suppliers, distributors, repairers and renters of tools and equipment used within the building material industry including companies that provide services to these companies. It is not for raw materials or industrial supplies, these should be submitted to the "Materials and Supplies" category .

entries.title: Coatings
entries.description: Category includes distributors and suppliers of materials used in the construction and/or maintenance of walls, flooring, paint, coatings, and other related surfaces.

entries.title: Mouldings
entries.description: Manufacturers of architectural mouldings used in construction, renovation, restoration and maintenance are listed here.

entries.title: Tile
entries.description: This category contains links to sites related to tile and tiling materials and supplies: Please submit sites related to tile materials and supplies including, but not limited to: <ul> <li>Wholesale and Distribution</li> <li>Manufacturing</li> <li>Marketplaces</li> <li>Education and Training</li> </ul> <strong>ATTENTION:</strong> <em>Local retailers and showrooms for tile and tiling services</em> should <strong>NOT</strong> submitted here. Please direct your submission to the local/area <a href="/Business/Regional">Business and Economy</a> category for your local area. <strong>ATTENTION:</strong> <em>Local tile installers and contractors</em> should <strong>NOT</strong> be submitted here. Please direct your submission to the local/area <a href="/Business/Regional">Business and Economy</a> category for your local area.

entries.title: Wallpaper_and_Coverings
entries.description: Manufacturers of any covering for a wall that is sold by the roll or yard. This can include fabric designed to be hung as wallpaper.

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: Associations that focus on the wallcovering industry.

entries.title: Paperhanging
entries.description: This category is for professional wallcovering installers and the professional services that support them.

entries.title: Tools
entries.description: Tools that aid in the installation or production of wallcoverings.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Those companies that only distribute wallcoverings.

entries.title: Dealers
entries.description: Some log home manufacturers have dealers and brokers who sell the homes. The sites listed in this category are for those brokers and dealers.

entries.title: Retail
entries.description: This category includes retail chains, corporations, and holding companies. These sites are corporate homepages primarily focused on providing information about the retailer rather than functioning as a public consumer shopping destination.

entries.title: Rough_Carpentry
entries.description: The <strong>Rough Carpentry</strong> category is based on the Construction Specifications Institute (CSI) category: DIVISION: 06 — WOOD AND PLASTICS Section: 06100 — Rough Carpentry <i>Definition</i> <p>Rough Carpentry: Carpentry work not specified in other sections and not exposed, unless otherwise specified; may include, but not limited to: <ul> <li>structural and nonstructural framing, <li>other blocking and furring, <li>structural and nonstructural construction panels, <li>prefabricated structural wood, and <li>incidental carpentry work supporting other work. </ul> </p>

entries.title: Wood_and_Metal_Systems
entries.description: The <strong>Wood and Metal Systems</strong> category is based on the Construction Specifications Institute (CSI) category: DIVISION: 06 — WOOD AND PLASTICS Section: 06150 — Wood-Metal Systems

entries.title: Wood_and_Structural_Plastic_Fasteners
entries.description: Fasteners for wood and structural plastics include nails, screws, framing connectors, and other fastening materials used in construction.

entries.title: Wood_Products
entries.description: This category will hold all the sub-categories for machined, milled and fabricated products made from wood. Do not submit to this category. Chose the one most appropriate for your business. If your business does not ship your product to all the states or to other countries, find a Regional category to submit to.

entries.title: Architectural_Woodwork
entries.description: For sites to be listed in this category, the majority of its content must be about architectural woodwork. This would include manufactures, distributors, and other architectural woodworking services.

entries.title: Dimension_Lumber_and_Plywood
entries.description: This category is for wholesale suppliers of dimension cut lumber and plywood. Companies must offer and ship their products internationally. Hardware stores and local lumberyard companies should submit their sites to the appropriate Regional category as they will not be listed here.

entries.title: Millwork
entries.description: This category is for finished millwork product websites.

entries.title: Prefabricated_Structural_Wood
entries.description: The <strong>Prefabricated Structural Wood</strong> category is based on the Construction Specifications Institute (CSI) category: DIVISION: 06 — WOOD AND PLASTICS Section: 06170 — Prefabricated Structural Wood

entries.title: Veneers_and_Fine_Hardwoods
entries.description: This category is for veneers and fine hardwoods (and some softwoods, such as specialty, White Pine etc.). It is primarily for those companies and websites whose MAIN product is fine and/or exotic woods for millwork, cabinetry, furniture, and specialty products. It is NOT for general hardwood products such as pallets, flooring, truck beds etc.

entries.title: Wood_Composites
entries.description: This category is for wholesale suppliers, distributors, and producers of wood composite materials used in the building industry. Hardware stores and local lumberyard companies should submit their sites to the appropriate Regional category as they will not be listed here. This area is not for toys, household items, and other products made from wood composites.

entries.title: Antique_and_Reclaimed
entries.description: Sites that specialize in wood flooring that is reclaimed or recycled from various sources.

entries.title: Suppliers
entries.description: This category contains links to sites about wood flooring suppliers, retailers and or installers.

entries.title: Remodeling
entries.description: Sources of materials, how-to guides and do-it-yourself information. Remodeling contractors are generally placed in the appropriate <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/By_Region/">regional</a> category based on the location of the business.

entries.title: Kitchen_and_Bath
entries.description: Category contains sites related to kitchen and bath remodeling services, including multi-national, national and regional firms that supply remodeling services.

entries.title: Refinishing
entries.description: Category contains National or regional sites which manufacture, distribute, or supply products and/or services for refinishing Kitchen and Bathroom services including bathtubs, tile, countertops, cabinets, appliances, and fiberglass surfaces. Online ordering preferred.

entries.title: Sunrooms_and_Atriums
entries.description: Business: Industries: Construction and Maintenance: Remodeling: Sunrooms and Atriums category is for national, international businesses, services or products pertaining to sunrooms, atriums and related "glazed" interior spaces. This category is not for regional businesses that serve a particular city, or state.

entries.title: Residential_Housing
entries.description: Companies that build conventional homes and/or distribute prefabricated or panelized residential homes, apartments and/or condominiums.

entries.title: Circular,_Geodesic
entries.description: Circular, Round or Dome Housing in which building materials are factory-cut to design specifications, may or may not be pre-assembled into "panels", transported to the site and assembled. These homes must meet the local, state or regional building codes where they are sited.

entries.title: Conventional
entries.description: Home Builders refers to companies that build new houses, plexes or apartments, by acting as the General Contractor (or local equivalent). This category is specifically not intended to include websites for any tradesman who is not a general contractor (or local equivalent) or does not specialize in homes. It is not intended to include websites for companies that are primarily remodels, restorers, designers, consultants, developers, realtors, or any trade other than the building of new homes. This category contains several subcategories. All builders that fit into any particular subcategory should be placed in the appropriate one. It is not intended that websites be duplicated between or within these subcategories. Only builders whose activities are too broad or general for a subcategory are intended to be accepted into the main Home Builders category.

entries.title: Manufactured
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers, distributors and constructors of residential manufactured housing. The term "manufactured home" was adopted in 1980 by the United States Congress to describe a type of house that is constructed in a factory to comply with a building code developed by the Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD). In the past, manufactured homes were called "mobile homes," a term that many people still use. However, "mobile" is no longer an accurate name because fewer than five percent of such homes are ever moved off the owner's original site.

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: This category is for Non Profit, educational and trade associations that inform, enable the support the development of the Manufactured Housing Industry.

entries.title: Sales
entries.description: The term "manufactured home" was adopted in 1980 by the United States Congress to describe a type of house that is constructed in a factory to comply with a building code developed by the Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD). In the past, manufactured homes were called "mobile homes," a term that many people still use. However, "mobile" is no longer an accurate name because fewer than five percent of such homes are ever moved off the owner's original site. Please submit manufacturers to Business: Construction and Maintenance: Residential Housing: Manufactured:

entries.title: Modular
entries.description: Built in a factory to the state, local or regional codes of where the home will be set-up. Modular Homes come in one or more sections, one or more stories, and in different architectural styles (Cape Cod, Victorian, Ranch, Traditional, Saltbox, Split-level, etc.). Modules are transported to the site on steel carriers, which are then removed, and reused for transporting another home (some states allow for a State Code Modular to retain an HUD like steel frame). Modular Homes are set upon permanent foundations.

entries.title: Panelized
entries.description: Essentially flat units - portions of walls with windows, doors, wiring, and outside siding - are manufactured in a factory, shipped to a building site on a flatbed truck, and then assembled. A panelized house must meet the local, state or regional building code for its site location.

entries.title: Precut
entries.description: Factory-built housing in which building materials are factory-cut to design specifications, (but not pre-assembled into "panels"), transported to the site and assembled. Pre-cut homes include most log homes, post frame, steel frame, cedar, timberframe and geodesic homes. These homes must meet the local, state or regional building codes where they are sited.

entries.title: Resources
entries.description: This category will list companies and directories that support the residential housing industry. This category is not for builders, contractors, developers and designers.

entries.title: Shelter
entries.description: Prefabricated shelter building materials are factory-cut to design specifications. They may or may not be pre-assembled into "panels". They are transported to the site and assembled.

entries.title: Steel_Frame
entries.description: New Home Construction Technology; Residential Steel Framing

entries.title: Restoration
entries.description: Firms offering services to repair and restore properties or parts of properties to their original condition. Includes building maintenance and cleaning.

entries.title: Steeple_Repair
entries.description: Restoration companies who work with steeples only.

entries.title: Specifications
entries.description: Construction specifications are detailed documents, describing materials, methods, and standards to be used in a project.

entries.title: Tools_and_Equipment
entries.description: For manufacturers, suppliers, distributors, repairers and renters of tools and equipment used within the construction industry. It is not for sites specific to building materials or supplies, these should be submitted to the "Materials and Supplies" category .

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: This category contains links to sites related to professional and trade associations focused on tools and equipment of the construction and maintenance industry.

entries.title: Attachments
entries.description: Manufacturers and suppliers whose prime function is the construction machinery attachment market.

entries.title: Brokers_and_Dealers
entries.description: Dealers in construction equipment whose prime function is to represent and sell new machinery for named manufacturers. Dealers who sell only used equipment should submit their sites to the following category : <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Tools_and_Equipment/Used/"> Used Machinery</a>.

entries.title: Compaction
entries.description: Manufacturers of machinery used for compaction within the construction industry, from plate compactors to heavy rolling machinery.

entries.title: Concrete
entries.description: Manufacturers of machinery used in the concrete construction industry. You will find additional sub categories to this main category. Please select and place your submission in that which best describes your product.

entries.title: Finishing
entries.description: Manufacturers of concrete finishing machinery, typically vibrators, compactors, screeding and ancillary equipment.

entries.title: Placing
entries.description: Manufacturers of concrete placing machinery, typically pumps, grouting systems and ancillary equipment.

entries.title: Production
entries.description: Manufacturers of machinery used in the production of concrete, to include mixers both static and mobile and batching plants.

entries.title: Cranes
entries.description: This category is for cranes used within the construction and marine industries only. Sites listed here will be those companies which undertake either one or all of the following operations: manufacturing, distribution, rental or repair of new or used equipment and/or spare parts for the following typical equipment : crawler cranes, hydraulic truck cranes ,rough terrain cranes, lattice boom truck cranes, tower cranes. Marine, harbor and floating cranes. Industrial and engineering lifting equipment should be submitted to the : <a href="/Business/Industrial_Goods_and_Services/Industrial_Supply/Materials_Handling/Manual/Cranes_and_Hoists/"> Materials_Handling/Manual/Cranes_and_Hoists/</a> category. Additionally only those companies which operate internationally, or for US companies which operate beyond state boundaries will be listed here. Regional operators should submit to the appropriate regional category.

entries.title: Manufacturing
entries.description: Companies specializing in manufacturing various types of construction cranes.

entries.title: Overhead
entries.description: need to separate overhead cranes from mobile cranes.

entries.title: Parts_and_Service
entries.description: Crane parts and services.

entries.title: Earthmoving
entries.description: This category holds links to manufacturers/producers of machinery and accessories used to move loose loads such as clay, loam, sand, gravel; topsoil, soil, dirt, overburden, etc., including: backhoes (excavators), backhoe loaders, dozers (bulldozers), graders (pull, motor), loaders (front end loaders: tractor, skid steer), shovels (front shovels: hydraulic, cable; mining), draglines (tracked, walking), scrapers (pull, motor), trenchers (bar, wheel), cable/pipe plows, sandbagging devices. Such devices are usually used in construction, landscaping, and agriculture.

entries.title: Accessories-Attachments
entries.description: This category holds links to manufacturers/producers of accessories and attachments for only earthmoving equipment, with international organizations, or United States organizations, which operations reach throughout the 48 states. For makers of accessories and attachments for other heavy equipment, or generally for such systems, see a suitable category in: <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Tools_and_Equipment/Attachments/">Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Tools_and_Equipment/Attachments</a>

entries.title: Dealers
entries.description: This category holds links to dealers and distributors (sellers who do not produce) of machinery and accessories used to move loose loads such as clay, loam, sand, gravel; topsoil, soil, dirt, overburden, etc., including: backhoes (excavators), backhoe loaders, dozers (bulldozers), graders (pull, motor), front end loaders (tractor, skid steer), mining shovels (front shovels), scrapers (pull, motor), trenchers (bar, wheel), cable/pipe plows, sandbagging devices.

entries.title: Parts
entries.description: This category holds links to manufacturers/producers, and distributors, of parts, components, and subsystems for earthmoving equipment only, with international organizations, and United States organizations, which operations reach throughout the 48 states. For makers of parts for other heavy equipment, or generally for such systems, see: <a href="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Tools_and_Equipment/Parts_and_Service/Parts/">Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Tools_and_Equipment/Parts_and_Service/Parts</a>

entries.title: Sandbaggers
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of systems used to facilitate filling sandbags, which have many civil and military uses: controlling and containing: floods and water, hazardous material spills, soil erosion, fires, soil in construction projects, barricades for roads and railroads; packaging loose material for shipping, storage, and sale; stopping bullets, explosion fragments, speeding cars.

entries.title: Foundation
entries.description: Manufacturers and suppliers whose prime function is foundation engineering equipment.

entries.title: Import_and_Export
entries.description: Companies that import and export tools.

entries.title: Marketplaces
entries.description: <strong>Marketplaces</strong> facilitate interactions and transactions between buyers and sellers in the <i>construction tools and equipment industry</i>, providing a platform for promoting products and services and allowing buyers to select the most appropriate or cost-effective source.

entries.title: Material_Handling
entries.description: This category is for Construction and Maintenance: Tools and Equipment: Material Handling. This category is for equipment specific to the construction and maintenance industry. Equipment which can be used in more than one industry is listed within <a href="/Business/Industrial_Goods_and_Services/Industrial_Supply/Materials_Handling/">Industrial_Supply/Materials_Handling</a>.

entries.title: Parts_and_Service
entries.description: This category is for those who provide either or all of the following : repairs, refurbishment. parts new and old in connection with heavy construction equipment. Please check the sub categories to this main category to ensure that your submission is best placed to suit your service or product.

entries.title: Parts
entries.description: Manufacturers and suppliers whose prime function is the sale of new parts for machinery used in the construction industry. If your organization primarily sells used parts your site should be submitted the used parts category.

entries.title: Used
entries.description: Manufacturers and suppliers whose prime function is the sale of used parts for machinery used in the construction industry. If your organization primarily sells new parts your site should be submitted the new parts category.

entries.title: Repair
entries.description: Organizations whose prime function is the repair of machinery within in the construction market.

entries.title: Quarry_and_Aggregate_Production
entries.description: Manufacturers of machinery used in the quarry and aggregate production industry. Typically screening, washing and crushing machinery.

entries.title: Rental
entries.description: Organizations whose prime function is the rental of machinery within the construction market.

entries.title: Directories
entries.description: This category is for nationwide, international and worldwide directories of companies that rent construction and maintenance tools and equipment.

entries.title: Road_Construction
entries.description: Manufacturers of machinery used in road construction and road maintenance industries. This will include construction, maintenance and asphalt or bitumen production machinery.

entries.title: Production
entries.description: Manufacturers of machinery used for the production of asphalt or bitumen.

entries.title: Scaffolds
entries.description: This category is for those organizations who manufacture, supply and erect scaffolding, access platforms, and associated equipment. Local suppliers and erectors should submit their sites to the appropriate <A HREF="/Regional/">Regional</A> category

entries.title: Tools
entries.description: This category is for businesses that sell, hire, repair or otherwise deal with tools that are intended for use in the construction and maintenance industry.

entries.title: Air_and_Hydraulic
entries.description: Air and Hydraulic category tools utilize compressed air or hydraulic fluid as a power source for tools that are used in the construction industry. Tools might include jack hammers, chippers, scalers, drills, hydraulic bolt cutters, nailers etc.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category is intended for web sites of wholesale suppliers (distributors) of tools who generally sell to Original Equipment Manufacturers, industrial accounts and the professional trades.

entries.title: Hand_and_Power
entries.description: This category is intended for web sites of wholesale suppliers of hand and power tools (electric, pneumatic and hydraulic).

entries.title: Industrial
entries.description: This category is intended for web sites of wholesale suppliers of industrial tools such as cutting tools, machine tools, construction tools and tool and die equipment.

entries.title: Used
entries.description: Dealers and suppliers whose prime function is the sale of used machinery within the construction market.

entries.title: Trenchless_Technology
entries.description: This category has been established to organize web sites with information pertaining to trenchless technology so that directory users will have easy access to such information. Trenchless technology is a diversified industry primarily within the construction and engineering industries, but with considerable ties to academic institutions (including multiple academic centers dedicated to trenchless technology), and with its own professional societies, trade magazines, website portals, etc. The trenchless technology industry uses various technologies to limit the disturbance of surface structures during the new installation or the repair of existing underground structures. In addition to being less disruptive, trenchless technologies are often faster and more cost-effective than the traditional direct burial construction techniques. Trenchless technologies such as horizontal directional drilling (hdd), microtunneling, pipe jacking, etc. are routinely used for the new installation of utility piping for the sewer, water, gas, power, cable, and telecommunications industries. Trenchless technologies such as grouting, coating, pipelining, pipe bursting, etc. are routinely used for the repair or replacement of such existing underground utilities, often as part of a regular operations and maintenance program.

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: There are several professional societies or trade organizations which are directly concerned with the trenchless technology industry. There are also broader interest trade associations with active trenchless technology programs and committees. Many professional societies actively support trenchless technology research and directly or indirectly promote the growth of the trenchless technology industry. This category is for links to such organizations. If a direct link to a trenchless technology committee page is not possible, where possible, the name (or names) of the trenchless technology committee(s) should be listed in the site description.

entries.title: Chats_and_Forums
entries.description: The trenchless technology industry is beginning to take advantage of the interactive communications afforded by the internet. The bulletin boards and mailing lists related to trenchless technology are becoming a primary source for trenchless technology information gathering and professional networking. This category is for the organizing of such interactive resources where trenchless technology information can be gathered.

entries.title: Conferences
entries.description: This category is for links to web pages containing information regarding, conferences, expositions, trade shows, seminars, symposiums, etc. which are either focused upon trenchless technology, or which often have significant trenchless technology related exhibits and papers.

entries.title: Contracting_Firms
entries.description: This category is for websites of construction firms particularly engaged in the application of trenchless technologies. Site descriptions should include information regarding the trenchless technologies performed by the contracting firm.

entries.title: Directories
entries.description: Several independent portal and directory sites related to trenchless technology have begun to appear on the internet. Many are labors of love created by individuals who truly appreciate the trenchless technology industry. Others are commercial ventures of publishing companies, consulting engineers, or vendors. All of them are providing easier access to trenchless technology information.

entries.title: Education_and_Training
entries.description: There are several academic centers which have been established to research trenchless technology. There are also numerous research foundations which support and conduct academic research regarding trenchless technology. Additionally, there are numerous individual academicians who are involved in trenchless technology research. This category has been established to organize links to organizations and individuals involved in the research of trenchless technology, or the funding thereof.

entries.title: Materials_and_Supplies
entries.description: This category is for the organization of links to companies which supply products (other than equipment) to the trenchless technology industry. @Links to broader categories should be created where possible, but duplications are acceptable into this sub-category if necessary to distinguish a few product manufacturers who actually provide products directly suited to and promoted for trenchless technology use. Sites of diversified companies should not be excluded merely because they do more than trenchless technology. Where possible deep-links to trenchless technology pages should be used to show the diversified company's trenchless technology products. When such deep-links are not possible or practical, the site description should specifically express the company's trenchless industry involvement.

entries.title: News_and_Media
entries.description: The trenchless technology industry has several dedicated trade publications. There are also several related trade publications which regularly include articles of interest to trenchless technology professionals. This category is for the organization of such links. The site description should include an explanation of the type of trenchless technology coverage expected within the publication.

entries.title: Professional_Services
entries.description: This category has been established for organizing links to consulting engineering firms, testing laboratories, and other professional services serving the trenchless technology industry. Trenchless technology expertise amongst consulting engineers is growing, but relatively few engineers are experienced with the growing field of trenchless design. This category has been established to provide links to consulting engineers known to have been involved with trenchless design projects. Trenchless information available at the website should be noted in the site description. Direct page links to individual engineers with trenchless technology expertise is encouraged, as many of the firms are extremely large and diversified.

entries.title: Tools_and_Equipment
entries.description: This category has been created to organize links to sites pertaining to trenchless technology equipment manufacturers.

entries.title: Inspection,_Locating_and_Tracking
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of equipment for the inspection. locating and tracking of underground services .

entries.title: Pipeline_Cleaning
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of pipe cleaning equipment and tools used in the underground services industry .

entries.title: Pipe_Plugs
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and distributors of pipe plugging equipment used in the construction of underground services

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category contains links related to the sale and distribution of tools and equipment related to the trenchless technology and horizontal directional drilling (HDD) industry.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category is for the organization of links to the websites of sales representatives, supply houses, and trading houses with specific involvement in trenchless technology promotion and sales.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category will list companies that purchase products from Producers and Manufacturers in bulk and resell it without transformation to re-sellers. The Wholesalers and Distributors that will be listed in this category are associated with Construction and Maintenance industry. Companies that provide services to these Wholesalers and Distributors will be listed here. This category will not list Manufacturers' Representatives or Retailers.

entries.title: Consumer_Goods_and_Services

translations.ron: Servicii şi bunuri de larg consum
translations.tha: สินค้าบริโภคและบริการ
translations.jpn: 製品・サービス（一般消費者向け）

entries.description: The <b>Consumer Goods and Services</b> sector category includes industries and companies focused on manufacturing, distributing and marketing finished products that will be used by the general public. Also included here are links to categories covering personal service industries and companies that provide services to the consumer market (note: most of the consumer services categories exist elsewhere in the ODP, and are represented here by @links). <ul> <li>Industries and companies focused on providing professional and administrative services primarily to other businesses are listed under <a href="/Business/Business_Services/">Business/Business_Services</a>.</li> <li>Producers and supplies of the materials, substances, components, machinery and other industrial technology used in manufacturing goods are listed under <a href="/Business/Industrial_Goods_and_Services/">Business/Industrial Goods and Services</a>.  However, producers and suppliers of materials, substances, components, machinery and other industrial technology used in the manufacture of <b>specific </b>consumer goods are listed under Consumer Goods and Services (e.g. a manufacture of  fans for use in home appliances; or water heaters for consumer as well as commercial use).</li> </ul>

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: This category is for professional associations dealing with Consumer Goods and/or Services. This can include organizations representing a range of products, services, or a commercial business sector, or developing professional standards, networking, and information exchange.

entries.title: Awards
entries.description: <p>The <b>Awards</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing of products related to awards.</p>

entries.title: Ribbons
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of award ribbons and rosettes.

entries.title: Supplies_and_Equipment

entries.title: Beauty
entries.description: <p>The <b>Beauty</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to beauty.</p>

entries.title: Cosmetics
entries.description: Contains listings of manufacturers of cosmetic products, information used by manufacturers, and materials used in the manufacture of cosmetics. Wholesalers and retailers of cosmetic products may be listed here if they also manufacture their own products, or are affiliated with manufacturing companies.

entries.title: Makeup_Artists
entries.description: Make-up Artists are individuals focusing on the art of applying make-up, often offering a mobile service, or offering a specific date service such as make-up for a wedding party or other event. Can be artist in residence at a salon or a training facility, but not usually representing or being represented by these.

entries.title: Aromatherapy

entries.title: Incense
entries.description: Wholesale Incense Suppliers Please submit only those companies that offer true wholesale to qualified merchants. Discount is not wholesale. Wholesale is when a price is being offered to qualified retailers or merchants who sell to the general public.

entries.title: Hair_Care
entries.description: Contains business related listings for manufacturers of hair care and styling products, wigs and hair accessories.

entries.title: Wigs
