entries.title: Nail_Care
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to nail care.</p>

entries.title: Tanning
entries.description: Manufacturers, distributors, suppliers, and franchisers of products and systems for tanning. (Includes tanning beds, sunless tanning products, etc.)

entries.title: Brushes
entries.description: This category lists companies involved in the manufacture and sale of static and rotational industrial brushes.

entries.title: Children
entries.description: <p>The <b>Children</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to children. It includes items intended for children or their parents, including baby bottles, strollers, and car seats.</p>

entries.title: Baby_Equipment
entries.description: For sites of manufacturers who specialize in creating baby equipment. These items can include strollers, walkers, high chairs, car seats, and associated pieces.

entries.description: For sites of manufacturers who product blankets and assorted pieces of bedding for children. These can include baby, toddler and children sized products.

entries.description: For sites of manufacturers who produce items that are geared toward providing safety to children and babies. These items can include child locks, doorway gates, monitors and other items that guard against potential harm coming to children.

entries.description: <p>The <b>Clothing</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to clothing. Items include accessories, clothing fasteners, and finished garments for men, women, and children.</p>

entries.title: Accessories
entries.description: This category lists MANUFACTURERS of garment and fashion accessories only. No sites will be listed on this entry page. Please, scroll down and submit your site to the category most appropriate to your business. Thank you for your cooperation.

entries.title: Gloves
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of gloves, in as far as they are made from textile materials and leather only. Manufacturers of gloves from plastic materials should submit at <a href="/Business/Industrial_Goods_and_Services/Industrial_Supply/Safety_Equipment_Supplies/Apparel/Gloves/"> Industrial_Supply</a> category.

entries.title: Handbags_and_Purses
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of all-purpose and fashion handbags only.

Wholesale sites should be submitted to the <a href="/Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Clothing/Accessories/Wholesale_and_Distribution/"> Wholesale_and_Distribution</a> category. Thank you for your cooperation.

entries.title: Leather_Goods

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: <H1 align="center"><font color="red">Wholesale</font></H1> The Wholesale Trade sector comprises establishments engaged in wholesaling merchandise, generally without transformation, and rendering services incidental to the sale of merchandise.<br> The wholesaling process is an intermediate step in the distribution of merchandise. Wholesalers are organized to sell or arrange the purchase of sale of (a) goods for resale (i.e. goods sold to other wholesalers or retailers), (b) capital or durable nonconsumer goods, and (c) raw and intermediate materials and supplies used in production.<br> Wholesale/ contains sites of companies of whose primary focus is to purchase goods and merchandise from producers and manufacturers and to sell them to re-sellers in bulk.<br> This category includes apparel accessories such as: belts, scarves, hats and gloves. Items such as yarn, buttons and zippers are not included. <H2 align="center"><font color="red">Wholesale_Trade</font></H2> Wholesale/ lists the sites of companies which concentrate to the definition (a) above.

In addition, the the device might also conduct more advanced operations like statistics functions and small programs.

entries.title: Flashlights
entries.description: This category is intended for manufacturers of flashlight, LED and pointer devices.

entries.title: LED
entries.description: This category is intended for manufacturers of LED flashlight only.

entries.title: Audio
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to consumer audio electronics, including car audio equipment, home audio equipment, record players, tape players, CD players, MP3 players, and accessories. Sites about speakers will be in the Speakers subcategory.</p> <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the consumer audio electronics business.</p>

entries.title: Accessories
entries.description: <p>Anything that's doesn't fall into the other categories (Speakers, Amplification, Digital, Analog, Music) related to audio (not video accessories). Items included:</p> <ul> <li>Cable-ware (speaker, line, digital, electrical).</li> <li>Furniture (stands, racks).</li> <li>Replacement tubes/valves.</li> <li>Totally un-categorizable weirdness, e.g. Shun Mook and Peter Belt</li> </ul>

entries.title: Anti-Vibration_and_Isolation
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to consumer audio electronics anti-vibration and isolation devices and accessories.</p> <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the consumer audio electronics anti-vibration and isolation devices and accessories business.</p>

entries.title: Cables
entries.description: This category is for sites whose primary focus is consumer audio cables and wires products. Sites about video cables<A HREF="/Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Electronics/Accessories/Cables/">Accessories/Cables</A>.

entries.title: Power_Conditioners
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to consumer audio electronics power conditioners accessories.</p> <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the consumer audio electronics power conditioners accessories business.</p>

entries.title: Sound_Enhancement
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to consumer audio electronics audio enhancement accessories.</p> <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the consumer audio electronics audio enhancement accessories business.</p>

entries.title: Amplification
entries.description: This category is for sites whose primary focus is consumer audio electronics amplification products, including <B>exclusively</B> amplification, pre-amps, phono stages, power amps, and integrateds. Sites about cables, cd, dvd, etc.. must be in the parent category <A HREF="/Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Electronics/Audio/">Audio</A>.

entries.title: Vacuum_Tubes
entries.description: This category is for sites whose primary focus is consumer audio electronics vacuum tubes amplification products, including <B>exclusively</B> amplification, pre-amps, phono stages, power amps, and integrateds. Sites about cables, cd, dvd, etc.. must be in the parent category <A HREF="/Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Electronics/Audio/">Audio</A>.

entries.title: Analog
entries.description: <p>Analog here is in the sense of vinyl recordings. The gear includes turntables, tone-arms, and cartridges.</p>

entries.title: Components
entries.description: Manufacturers of component parts rather than complete audio products. For examples drivers, horns, capacitors, volume controls.

entries.title: Headphones
entries.description: Manufacturers that make exclusively headphones and headphones accessories.

entries.title: News_and_Media
entries.description: News and Media covering the audio industry.

entries.title: Speakers
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing only speakers to consumer. <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the consumer speakers business.</p>

entries.title: Drivers
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing only speakers drivers or related parts. <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the consumer speakers drivers business.</p>

entries.title: Dynamic
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing only <B>dynamic speakers.</B> to consumer. <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the consumer horn speakers business.</p>

entries.title: Horn
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing only <B>horn speakers</B> to consumer. <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the consumer horn speakers business.</p>

entries.title: Outdoor
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing only outdoor speakers to consumer. <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the consumer outdoor speakers business.</p>

entries.title: Planar_and_Electrostatic
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing <B>only planar, ribbon and electrostatic speakers</B> to consumer. <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the consumer planar, ribbon and electrostatic speakers business.</p>

entries.title: Subwoofer
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing only <B>subwoofer speakers</B> to consumer. <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the consumer subwoofer speakers business.</p>

entries.title: Home_Theater
entries.description: This category is for sites whose primary focus is consumer home theater electronics, including televisions.<br><br>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, distributor and trade associations. <B>Local store and installer must be submitted in <A HREF="/Regional">Regional</A></B>

entries.title: News_and_Media
entries.description: For sites of regularly issued online publications containing articles and illustrations, covering electronics consumer goods and services related matter.

entries.title: Radios
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the online store which offers radios and related equipment to consumer.

entries.title: Video
entries.description: This category is for sites whose primary focus is consumer video electronics, including camcorders, DVD players, VCRs, and accessories.<br><br>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the consumer video electronics business.

entries.title: Cables
entries.description: This category is for sites whose primary focus is consumer video cables and wires products. Sites about video cables<A HREF="/Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Electronics/Accessories/Cables/">Accessories/Cables</A>.

entries.title: Television
entries.description: This category is for sites whose primary focus is consumer televisions, projectors and accessories.<br><br>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the consumer video electronics business.

entries.title: Eyewear

translations.jpn: めがね・コンタクトレンズ

entries.description: <p>The <b>Eyewear</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to eyewear. It includes contact lenses, eyeglasses, optical frames, sunglasses, safety glasses, lenses for eyewear products and accessories directly related to the use of eyewear, such as eyeglass cases and cleaning products.</p>

entries.title: Contact_Lenses
entries.description: Contact lenses are vision aids that are worn on the eye's cornea.

entries.title: Eyeglasses
entries.description: eyeglasses

entries.title: Ophthalmic_Lenses
entries.description: ophthalmic lenses

entries.title: Optical_Accessories
entries.description: Optical Accessories

entries.title: Optical_Frames
entries.description: Optical Frames (frames for eyeglasses, sunglasses, reading glasses)

entries.title: Reading_Glasses
entries.description: Eyewear generally available without a prescription, usually providing simple magnification.

entries.title: Sunglasses
entries.description: Sunglasses are protective eyewear designed to shield the eyes from sun or glare.

entries.title: Firearms
entries.description: <p>The <b>Firearms</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to firearms.</p>

entries.title: Airguns
entries.description: This category lists web sites from manufacturers of airguns.

entries.title: Blackpowder_and_Muzzleloaders
entries.description: Business and individuals who manufacture, craft, sell, and/or repair blackpowder guns.

entries.title: Handguns
entries.description: This category is for sites related primarily to Handguns. Sites will only be listed once in Firearms. Sites pertaining to a broad range of firearms types should be submitted directly to Firearms. Sites pertaining to specific types of firearms or their accessories should be suggested to the appropriate sub-category. If an appropriate sub-category does not exist, please suggest the site directly to Firearms.

entries.title: Rifles
entries.description: This category is for sites related primarily to Rifles. Sites will only be listed once in Firearms. Sites pertaining to a broad range of firearms types should be submitted directly to Firearms. Sites pertaining to specific types of firearms or their accessories should be suggested to the appropriate sub-category. If an appropriate sub-category does not exist, please suggest the site directly to Firearms.

entries.title: Fireworks
entries.description: <p>The <b>Fireworks</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to consumer fireworks. Consumer fireworks are small and relatively harmless compared to the larger professional display fireworks one sees in the sky at major special events. Consumer fireworks are designed to be bought in packages and used by the average consumer. They are not legal in all areas, but where they are legal they typically do not require a license or any particular skills to use, unlike display fireworks which often require professional licensed operators for safety and liability reasons. </p>

entries.title: Floral
entries.description: <p>The <b>Floral</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to flowers, foliages and decorative botanicals.</p>

entries.title: Retailers
entries.description: This category lists retail trade associations in the floral industry.

entries.title: Chats_and_Forums
entries.description: Contains newsletters, newsgroups, forums, message boards, and chat rooms which discuss broad related topics for growers, importers, wholesalers and retailers of floral products.

entries.title: Consulting
entries.description: This category lists firms that offer expertise and knowledge in aspects of the floral trade.

entries.title: Education_and_Training
entries.description: This category lists institutes, companies and individuals that provide education and training to the floral industry.

entries.title: Flowers_and_Foliages
entries.description: These categories list producers of flowers, foliages and related botanical materials sold by the floral trade.

entries.title: Artificial_and_Silk
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of artificial flowers, foliages, plants and related permanent botanical materials, as well as producers of completed designs crafted from those components.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category contains sites of companies whose primary focus is to purchase artificial and silk flowers and related botanical materials from producers and manufacturers and to sell them to re-sellers in bulk.<br>

entries.title: Dried_and_Preserved
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers and producers of dried and preserved flowers, foliages, vines and related botanical materials, as well as producers of completed designs crafted from those components.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category contains sites of companies whose primary focus is to purchase dried and/or preserved flowers and related botanical materials from producers and manufacturers and to sell them to re-sellers in bulk.<br>

entries.title: Materials_and_Supplies
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers that produce flower care and design-related products and supplies used primarily in conjunction with the floral trade.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category contains sites of companies whose primary focus is to purchase floral supplies from producers and manufacturers and to sell them to re-sellers in bulk.<br> The wholesaling process is an intermediate step in the distribution of merchandise. Wholesalers are organized to sell or arrange the purchase of sale of (a) goods for resale (i.e. goods sold to other wholesalers or retailers), (b) capital or durable non-consumer goods, and (c) raw and intermediate materials and supplies used in production.<br>

entries.title: News_and_Media
entries.description: This category lists sites of news services, newspapers, books, magazines and e-zines that primarily focus on the floral industry.

entries.title: Relay
entries.description: This category is for sites of companies offering networks which transfer floral orders to retail florists for fulfillment.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category contains sites of companies whose primary focus is to purchase flowers and related supplies from producers and manufacturers and to sell them to re-sellers in bulk.<br> The wholesaling process is an intermediate step in the distribution of merchandise. Wholesalers are organized to sell or arrange the purchase of sale of (a) goods for resale (i.e. goods sold to other wholesalers or retailers), (b) capital or durable non-consumer goods, and (c) raw and intermediate materials and supplies used in production.<br>

entries.title: Gifts_and_Occasions
entries.description: <p>The <b>Gifts</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to gifts.</p>

entries.title: Conferences
entries.description: The category for gift industry covers conferences, trade shows, events and expositions.

entries.title: Corporate_Gifts
entries.description: Corporate gifts are a product given by a business to its customers, employees, friends or other influentials for goodwill and without obligation.

entries.title: Greeting_Cards
entries.description: Contains sites primarily selling greeting card products to retail stores. Wholesale sites also selling retail are found in the Shopping:Gifts:Cards category.

entries.title: Party_Supplies
entries.description: <p>Manufacturers, wholesalers and distributors of gifts and supplies for parties and occasions.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: <p>This category lists sites related to the wholesalers and distributors of Gift items. These are primarily sites of companies of whose primary focus is to purchase gift goods and merchandise from producers and manufacturers and to sell them to re-sellers in bulk. </p>

entries.title: Holidays
entries.description: <p>The <b>Holidays</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to holiday items. This may include decorations, ornaments, and other products used during a specific holiday.</p>

entries.title: Ornaments
entries.description: This category contains the official sites of manufacturers and primary distributors of collectible Christmas ornaments.

entries.title: Home_and_Garden

translations.tha: บ้านและสวน

entries.description: The Consumer Goods and Services: Home and Garden sector category includes industries and companies focused on manufacturing, distributing and marketing finished products that will be used by the general public.<P> Producers and suppliers of materials, substances, components, machinery and other industrial technology used in the manufacture of specific consumer goods are listed under Consumer Goods and Services (e.g. a manufacture of fans for use in home appliances; or water heaters for consumer as well as commercial use).

entries.title: Appliances
entries.description: The <b>Appliances</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing and distribution of products related to home appliances.

entries.title: Air_Conditioners
entries.description: <p>The <b>Air Conditioners</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing and distribution of home air conditioners.</p>

entries.title: Climate_Control
entries.description: <p>The <b>Climate Control</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing and distribution of space heaters, electric fans, wood stoves, humidifiers, and dehumidifiers.</p>

entries.title: Kitchen_and_Dining
entries.description: Manufacturers of appliances for the kitchen and dining room.

entries.title: Countertop
entries.description: Manufacturing, wholesale, and importing/exporting of bread machines, toasters, ice cream makers, coffee makers and urns, coffee grinders, rotisserie ovens, mixers, blenders, kettles, crockpots, deep fryers, popcorn makers, can openers, and other countertop appliances.

entries.title: Laundry
entries.description: Manufacturing, wholesale, and import/export of washer/dryers, irons, and other laundry appliances.

entries.title: Repair_and_Restoration
entries.description: Contains links to companies that restore or repair appliances.

entries.title: Ceramics
entries.description: Manufacturers of ceramic items for the home.

entries.title: Decor_and_Design
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of decorative items for the home.

entries.title: Candles
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of candles and related items.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Distributor: an entity that markets a commodity, usually a wholesaler. Wholesaler: an entity that sells items in quantities usually for resale by a retail merchant. Manufacturer Representative: an entity that acts for a manufacturer through delegated authority.

entries.title: Lighting
entries.description: Manufactures and distributors of lighting products to be used in the home.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Distributors of lighting products used in the home.

entries.title: Ornamental_Plaster
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of decorative ornamental plaster items.

entries.title: Ornamental_Concrete
entries.description: Sites pertaining to the ornamental concrete industry. Sites having products related to the manufacturing of ornamental concrete. Any concrete item that can be used for ornamental purposes, wether interior or exterior.

entries.title: Visual_Arts
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of decorative visual art items for the home.

entries.title: Frames
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of picture frames, and the supplies used in frame construction.

entries.title: Paintings
entries.description: This category lists companies which manufacture paintings in large quantities. Individual artists and galleries are listed in the related categories.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category will list the wholesalers of paintings, pictures statues, picture frames and the supplies used in frame construction.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This section is designed for Business to Business wholesale and distribution sites which sell a broad range of home decor and design related products. This section is intended for Business to Business sites only. Selling at "Wholesale Prices" to the public does not qualify the site for inclusion in this category.

entries.title: Furniture
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesale distributors of furniture for the home.

entries.title: Directories
entries.description: Furniture manufacturing and wholesale trade directories.

entries.title: Import_and_Export
entries.description: This is the general category for all import and export related service companies, including agents, traders, distributors, consultants, web sites, trade portals and other intermediaries. This category will list import and export related service companies, including agents, traders, consultants, web sites, trade portals and other intermediaries. This category will not list: 1) Manufactures - If you make a product submit your URL to the appropriate sub category for manufacturing. 2) Wholesalers and Distributors - If you buy products for the purpose of reselling them to other companies do not submit here. 3) Retailers - If you sell a product to the general consumer do not submit your URL here. 5) Shippers - If your function is to move products from point A to point B do not submit here.

entries.title: Materials_and_Supplies
entries.description: Includes sites for companies that manufacture the raw materials and components used in the manufacture of furniture.

entries.title: Components
entries.description: This category includes manufacturers and suppliers of components and parts used in the assembly of interior and exterior furnishings. Retailers of replacement components and parts for consumers should be listed in the appropriate category in Shopping.

entries.title: News_and_Media
entries.description: For sites of regularly issued online publications containing articles and illustrations, covering furniture related matter.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Listed here include sites of companies that purchase in volume and sell at a wholesale price. These are typically companies that import or otherwise purchase directly from the manufacturer and maintain a reasonably large inventory. They then sell the items to stores and other resellers or retailers who sell to the public. They do not sell directly to the public typically and are <strong> not the manufacturers</strong>.

entries.title: Kitchen_and_Dining
entries.description: Manufacturers or distributors of housewares for the kitchen and dining room.

entries.title: Accessories
entries.description: Manufacturers of kitchen and dining accessories.

entries.title: China
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of china products for home use.

entries.title: Cookware
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of cookware for home use.

entries.title: Cutlery
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of cutlery for home use.

entries.title: Glassware
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of glassware items for kitchen or dining use.

entries.title: Wine_and_Bar
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of glassware items for use in a home bar.

entries.title: Tableware
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of tableware for home use.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Wholesale distributors of housewares for the kitchen and dining room.

entries.title: Lawn_and_Garden
entries.description: Manufacturers of lawn and garden items.

entries.title: Outdoor_Cooking
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesale distributors of barbecue grills, smokers, and outdoor cooking accessories.

entries.title: Storage_Sheds
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of storage products for lawn and garden equipment.

entries.title: Tree_Houses
entries.description: Treehouse constructors

entries.title: Pots_and_Containers
entries.description: Manufacturers of planters, urns. and plant pots.

entries.title: Swimming_Pools_and_Spas
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of pools, spas, and related equipment.

entries.title: Covers
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of pool and spa covers.

entries.title: Domes_and_Enclosures
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of pool and spa domes and enclosures.

entries.title: Tools_and_Equipment
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of pool and spa equipment and specialized tools.

entries.title: Tools_and_Equipment
entries.description: Manufacturers of lawn and garden tools and equipment.

entries.title: Hand_Tools
entries.description: Manufacturers of hand tools for lawn and garden use.

entries.title: Power_Tools
entries.description: Manufacturers of power tools and equipment for use on the lawn or garden.

entries.title: Water_Displays_and_Statues
entries.description: Manufacturers and wholesalers of water gardens and related equipment.

entries.title: Fountains
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of fountains.

entries.title: Ponds_and_Waterfalls
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of outdoor ponds and waterfalls.

entries.title: Statues
entries.description: Manufacturers and distributors of statues.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Wholesalers and distributors of lawn and garden items.

entries.title: News_and_Media
entries.description: For sites of regularly issued online publications containing articles and illustrations, covering home and garden related matter.

entries.title: Storage_and_Shelving
entries.description: Manufacturers, wholesalers, and import/export companies specializing in storage furniture.

entries.title: Garage
entries.description: Businesses focused on storage and shelving to be used primarily in garages.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: <H1 align="center"><font color="red">Wholesale</font></H1><dl><dt>The Wholesale Trade sector comprises establishments engaged in wholesaling merchandise, generally without transformation, and rendering services incidental to the sale of merchandise.  </dt><dt>The wholesaling process is an intermediate step in the distribution of merchandise.  Wholesalers are organised to sell or arrange the purchase or sale of</dt><dd>(a) goods for resale (i.e. goods sold to other wholesalers or retailers),</dd><dd>(b) capital or durable non-consumer goods, and</dd><dd>(c) raw and intermediate materials and supplies used in production.</dd><dt>The Wholesale and Distribution categories contain sites of companies whose primary focus is to purchase goods and merchandise from producers and manufacturers and to sell them to re-sellers in bulk, according to the definition (a) above. </dt></dl>

entries.title: Jewelry
entries.description: <p>The <b>Jewelry</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to jewelry.</p>

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: This category deals with official organizations within the Gem, Jewelry and metalsmithing industry.

entries.title: Bead_and_Gemstone
entries.description: Jewelry manufactured which incorporates beads and/or semi and precious gemstones.

entries.title: Conferences
entries.description: This category lists major gem and jewelry industry trade shows.

entries.title: Diamond
entries.description: Diamond jewelry manufacturers. See also: <a href="/Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Jewelry/Diamond/Loose_Stones/">Loose Stones/</a>, a sub category of this which lists only loose diamond sites.

entries.title: Loose_Stones
entries.description: Loose diamonds.

entries.title: Fashion
entries.description: Manufacturers of fashion and costume jewelry.

entries.title: Pearl
entries.description: This category provides product and service information of pearl farms, cultivation processors, pearl jewelry manufacturers so that jewelers and suppliers for jewelers can make informed purchasing decisions. Sites in this category are producers of pearls and pearl cultivation products for suppliers, wholesale and retail outlets. Sites which are primarily promotional in nature, and not significantly useful in making informed choices for pearl supplies, can be found in appropriate Business, Regional, or Shopping categories.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category provides product and service information of import/export wholesale pearl providers and manufacturers of pearl jewelry so that jewelers can make informed purchasing decisions. Sites in this category are distributors that cater primarily to pearl jewelers and retail outlets. Sites which are primarily promotional in nature, and not significantly useful in making informed choices for pearl supplies, can be found in appropriate Business, Regional, or Shopping categories.

entries.title: Precious_Metals
entries.description: Listing of gold, silver and platinum jewelry manufacturers. Those who manufacturer only sterling silver jewelry should submit to <a href="/Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Jewelry/Precious_Metals/Silver/">Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Jewelry/Precious_Metals/Silver</a>.

entries.title: Silver
entries.description: This category is for jewelry manufacturers who produce only sterling silver jewelry. Those that produce a range of jewelry in silver and other precious metals should submit to <a href="/Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Jewelry/Precious_Metals/">Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Jewelry/Precious_Metals/</a>.

entries.title: Supplies
entries.description: Manufacturers of jewelry supplies including; findings, components, watch parts, metal refiners, casting services, beads and gemstone cutters.

entries.title: Loose_Stones
entries.description: Wholesalers of loose beads, loose colored stones and loose synthetic stones.

entries.title: Trade_Networks
entries.description: This category lists resources for the gem and jewelry industry including informational and educational resources, industry publications and electronic magazines and forums.

entries.title: Watches
entries.description: Category list of watch manufacturers.

entries.title: Accessories
entries.description: Manufacturers of watch accessories.

entries.title: Asia
entries.description: Manufacturers of watches and watch components based in Asia. Manufacturers may export outside of Asia to North America, Europe and other regions/countries.

entries.title: China
entries.description: Manufacturers of watches and watch components located in mainland China (excluding Hong Kong).

entries.title: India
entries.description: Manufacturers of watches and watch parts in India.

entries.title: Korea
entries.description: Manufacturers of watches located in Korea.

entries.title: Europe
entries.description: Manufacturers of watches and watch components based in Europe. Manufacturers may export outside of Europe to North America, Asia and other regions/countries.

entries.title: Switzerland
entries.description: Manufacturers of watches and watch components based in Switzerland. Manufacturers may export outside of Switzerland to North America, Asia and other regions/countries.

entries.title: North_America
entries.description: Manufacturers of watches and watch components based in Northamerica. Manufacturers may export outside of Northamerica to Asia, Europe and other regions/countries.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: <H1 align="center"><font color="red">Wholesale</font></H1> The Wholesale Trade sector comprises establishments engaged in wholesaling merchandise, generally without transformation, and rendering services incidental to the sale of merchandise.<br> The wholesaling process is an intermediate step in the distribution of merchandise. Wholesalers are organised to sell or arrange the purchase of sale of (a) goods for resale (i.e. goods sold to other wholesalers or retailers), (b) capital or durable nonconsumer goods, and (c) raw and intermediate materials and supplies used in production.<br> Wholesale/ contains sites of companies of whose primary focus is to purchase goods and merchandise from producers and manufacturers and to sell them to re-sellers in bulk.<br> <H2 align="center"><font color="red">Business/Wholesale_Trade</font></H2> Wholesale/ lists the sites of companies which concentrate to the definition (a) above.

entries.title: Luggage_and_Bags

translations.jpn: かばん・スーツケース

entries.description: <p>The <b>Luggage and Bags</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to luggage and bags.</p>

entries.title: Bags
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of bags only.

entries.title: Leather
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of luggage and bags for travel and shopping purposes, made from genuine leathers, only. Fashion handbags and purses must be submitted in the category <A HREF="/Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Clothing/Accessories/Handbags_and_Purses">Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Clothing/Accessories/Handbags_and_Purses</A>

entries.title: Marketing_and_Advertising
entries.description: Marketing and PR firms focused on consumer products and services are listed here.

entries.title: Marketplaces
entries.description: This category houses sites that facilitate interactions, transactions and trade between consumers and other consumers and/or business and consumers.

entries.title: News_and_Media
entries.description: For sites of regularly issued online publications containing articles and illustrations, covering consumer goods and services related matter.

entries.title: Regional
entries.description: Sites featuring a specific regional area.

entries.title: Office_Products

translations.tha: สินค้าสำนักงาน

entries.description: This <b>Office Products</b> sector category includes industries and companies focused on manufacturing, distributing, wholesaling, and marketing office products that will be used directly by the public or other businesses. It does not include sites which sell products online, or those for local supply stores or retailers.

entries.title: Equipment
entries.description: This <b>Office Equipment</b> category includes industries and companies focused on manufacturing, distributing, wholesaling, and marketing office equipment that will be used directly by the public or other businesses. It does not include sites which sell products online, or those for local supply stores or retailers.

entries.title: Copiers
entries.description: The <b>Copiers</b> category includes companies focused on manufacturing, distributing, and marketing copiers that will be used directly by the public or other businesses. It does not include sites which sell copiers online, or those for local supply stores or retailers.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category will list companies that purchase products from Producers and Manufacturers in bulk and resell it without transformation to re-sellers. The Wholesalers and Distributors that will be listed in this category are associated with Office supplies. Companies that provide services to these Wholesalers and Distributors will be listed here.

entries.title: Furniture
entries.description: This <b>Office Furniture</b> category includes industries and companies focused on manufacturing, distributing, and marketing office furniture that will be used directly by the public or other businesses. It does not include sites which sell products online, or those for local supply stores or retailers.

entries.title: Materials_and_Supplies
entries.description: For sites of companies that manufacture and sell either wholesale or to end consumers the materials, supplies or components that are used to manufacture or repair office furniture.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Sites for companies that sell wholesale only will be considered in this category. If site sells to end consumers as well, the site will be considered only if those retail sales are a MINOR part of company's trading.

entries.title: Work_Stations
entries.description: Sites located in this category are manufacturers of office work stations for home or office use. A work station typically is a piece or small structure that holds a computer system or equipment as an alternate location to work at. They sell wholesale and do not sell directly to the end consumer. Sites here will contain modular stations, partitions, and work centers, laptop tables and similar pieces.

entries.title: Supplies
entries.description: This <b>Office Supplies</b> category includes industries and companies focused on manufacturing, distributing, and marketing office supplies (excluding furniture or equipment)that will be used directly by the public or other businesses. It does not include sites which sell products online, or those for local supply stores or retailers.

entries.title: Pet_Supplies
entries.description: Pet supplies are those products normally used to feed, house, train, entertain, or care for pets including mammals, fish, insects, reptiles and birds.

entries.title: Birds
entries.description: Supplies for pet birds include cages, feeders, perches, toys and food.

entries.title: Cats
entries.description: Cat supplies include cages, scratching posts, beds, toys, food, catnip and accessories.

entries.title: Dogs
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of products used to house, train, transport or care for dogs.

entries.title: Fish
entries.description: Supplies for pet fish include food, aquariums and accessories such as pumps, filters and decorations.

entries.title: Pet_Food
entries.description: Pet food includes both the regular diet and treats for mammals, fish, insects, reptiles and birds.

entries.title: Dogs_and_Cats
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of food products normally used to feed dogs and cats.

entries.title: Natural
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of all natural food products used to feed pets including mammals, fish, reptiles and birds.

entries.title: Dogs_and_Cats
entries.description: Natural food products used to feed dogs and cats are usually those without artificial flavors, preservatives and other additives.

entries.title: Raw_Ingredients
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of natural pet food products using raw ( uncooked ) ingredients.

entries.title: Treats
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of all natural food products used as treats for pets including mammals, fish, reptiles and birds.

entries.title: Dogs_and_Cats
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of all natural food products used as treats for dogs and/or cats.

entries.title: Treats
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of products used as treats for pets including mammals, fish, reptiles and birds.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Wholesalers and distributors are responsible for selling products rather than making them.

entries.title: Recreation
entries.description: The <B>Recreation</B> category covers English language sites about hobbies, activities, and pastimes that are meant to give enjoyment during a participant's leisure time. The purpose of the category is to focus on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to leisure and recreation goods that will be used by the general public.</p>

entries.title: Models
entries.description: Producers of scale models.

entries.title: Boats_and_Ships
entries.description: Manufacturers of static models of boats and ships.

entries.title: Cars_and_Trucks
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to cars and trucks models.</p> <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the models business.</p>

entries.title: Slot_Cars
entries.description: Manufacturers of slot cars and parts.

entries.title: Diecast
entries.description: Diecast models

entries.title: Military
entries.description: Producers of military models, toy soldiers, and similar items.

entries.title: Miniatures_and_Dollhouses
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to miniatures and dollhouses.</p> <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the miniatures and dollhouses business.</p>

entries.title: Shops
entries.description: Sites of dollhouse miniature shops who do not sell online. Essentially "business card" sites that inform the visitor of their shop location, hours, and product lines.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Wholesale suppliers of miniature items generally deal only with other miniature businesses. Often, your local miniature store can order from these companies.

entries.title: Railroad
entries.description: Listings of makers of model railroading products. This section includes only companies that actually fabricate or assemble such products; retail sites that sell the products of others should be listed under the shopping area: http://dmoz.org/Shopping/Recreation_and_Hobbies/Models/Railroad/

entries.title: Accessories
entries.description: Manufacturers of miscellaneous model railroad related parts

entries.title: Buildings_and_Scenery
entries.description: Manufacturers of primarily buildings and scenery for model railroads.

entries.title: Decals,_Stencils,_Lettering
entries.description: Makers of decals, stencils and lettering for model railroads.

entries.title: Drawings,_Kits,_Plans,_Scratchbuilding
entries.description: Manufacturers of scale drawings, plans or kits (locomotives or rolling stock) for model railroads.

entries.title: Layouts,_Shelving,_Displays
entries.description: Manufacturers of custom or prefabricated layouts, shelving, and displays for model railroads.

entries.title: Lighting_and_Electrical
entries.description: Manufacturers of lighting and electrical products for model railroads.

entries.title: Remote_Control
entries.description: Manufacturers of radio Control and other remote control models.

entries.title: Airplanes
entries.description: Web sites for radio control model aviation manufacturers and suppliers.

entries.title: Boats
entries.description: Manufacturers of remote control boats, scale model boat kits generally used for remote control, and parts for remote control boats.

entries.title: Cars_and_Trucks
entries.description: Manufacturers of remote control cars and trucks and parts.

entries.title: Electronics
entries.description: Manufacturers of radios and other electronics for remote control models.

entries.title: Engines
entries.description: Web sites for radio control engines manufacturers and suppliers.

entries.title: Gliders
entries.description: A collection of websites of Manufacturers of products relating to the hobby of RC Soaring - radio controlled planes (sailplanes and gliders) that are not assisted in flight by power.

entries.title: Helicopters
entries.description: Web sites concerning the manufacture and supply of radio control model helicopter kits, parts, accessories, and supplies.

entries.title: Scale
entries.description: Sites in this category are manufacturers of scale model kits.

entries.title: Aircraft
entries.description: Sites in this category are manufacturers of aircrafts scale model.

entries.title: Cars_and_Trucks
entries.description: Sites in this category are manufacturers of scale model cars and trucks kits.

entries.title: Military
entries.description: Sites in this category are manufacturers of military scale model.

entries.title: Tools_and_Accessories
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to models tools and accessories such as airbrushes, and measurement tools.</p> <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the models business.</p>

entries.title: Outdoors
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of adventure outdoor equipment.

entries.title: Holds_and_Walls
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to indoor climbing and artificial hold.</p> <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the holds and walls business.</p>

entries.title: Retailers
entries.description: This category is for retailers of climbing gear and accessories.

entries.title: Cooking
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of recreational outdoor cooking equipment. Examples might include a camping stove company or a keen camper who designs portable kitchens.

entries.title: Metal_Detectors
entries.description: Sites offering the manufacture of metal detectors and accessories.

entries.title: Skiing
entries.description: Ski and apparel equipment listing

entries.title: Accessories
entries.description: <p>The <b>Accessories</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing accessories related to skiing. Typical types of products include wax, rack, dryer, or products that not fit in the category Skiing.</p>

entries.title: Tents
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to tents. <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the tents business.</p>

entries.title: Sporting_Goods
entries.description: <p>The <b>Sporting Goods</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to sporting goods that will be used by the general public.</p>

entries.title: Archery
entries.description: This category contains links to archery and bowhunting equipment manufacturers.

entries.title: Asia
entries.description: This category contains links to archery equipment manufacturers located in Asia.

entries.title: Europe
entries.description: This category contains links to archery equipment manufacturers located in Europe.

entries.title: North_America
entries.description: This category contains links to archery equipment manufacturers located in North America.

entries.title: Oceania
entries.description: This category contains links to archery equipment manufacturers located in Oceania.

entries.title: Boarding
entries.description: This category lists sites for board manufacturers including snowboards, all-terrain boards, surf boards, kitesurf boards, windsurf boards, mountainboards, grassboards, and skateboards.

entries.title: All-Terrain_Boarding
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of all-terrain boards, mountain boards, grass boards and dirt boards.

entries.title: Accessories
entries.description: Not skateboarding manufacturers but manufacturers and supplier for parts. Including but not limited to replacement parts, bearings, wheel's, etc.

entries.title: Longboard
entries.description: Longboard labels or manufacturers websites listing

entries.title: Scooters
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing products related to <B>non-motorized</B> scooters, parts and components.</p> <P><B>Motorized</B> scooters must be submitted in this category: <A HREF="/Business/Automotive/Motorcycles/Scooters/">Business/Automotive/Motorcycles/Scooters</A>

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Can include whole manufacturers and distributors.

entries.title: Boots_and_Bindings
entries.description: Manufacturers of boots and bindings for the snowboard industry.

entries.title: Cricket
entries.description: Sites for Cricket equipment manufacturers, distributors and wholesalers are listed in this category.

entries.title: Cue_Sports
entries.description: The <b>Billiards</b> category includes industries and companies focused on manufacturing, distributing and marketing finished billiard, pool, and or snooker products that will be used by the general public.

entries.title: Cycling
entries.description: Includes links to manufacturers and distributors of complete bicycle frames only. Manufacturers/distributors of components, accessories and apparel should submit to ONE of the associated sub-categories.

entries.title: Accessories
entries.description: This category lists sites of manufacturers of cycling parts, accessories, components, and equipment. Dealers, bike shops, retailers and online shopping sites containing manufacturer's parts and accessories should be submitted elsewhere.

entries.title: BMX
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to BMX bicycles <B>accessories, parts and components</B>. Bicycles manufacturers should be submitted to the <a href="/Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Sporting_Goods/Cycling/BMX/">Bicycles</a> category</p> <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the BMX business.</p>

entries.title: Brakes
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to brakes and related equipment. Bicycles manufacturers should be submitted to the <a href="/Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Sporting_Goods/Cycling/BMX/">Bicycles</a> category</p> <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the brakes business.</p>

entries.title: Security
entries.description: This category contains links to manufacturers of bicycle-related security systems, such as locks, chains, bars and 'cuffs'.

entries.title: Tires
entries.description: Cycling tires and tire-related products such as tire sealants, valve stems, inner tubes and liners.

entries.title: Trailers
entries.description: Trailers refer to any add-on device used to trail a bicycle (or recumbent for that matter). Trailers may include children's trailers, and trailercycles. Trailercycles allow children to learn basic bike-riding skills while attached to a rider with a full-size bicycle frame.

entries.title: BMX
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to BMX (aka, Bicycle Motorcross) and BSX (Bicycle Supercross) include a variety of cycling disciplines and areas such as street, flatland, vert and dirt jumping. Accessories, components and parts manufacturers should be submitted to the <a href="/Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Sporting_Goods/Cycling/Accessories/BMX/">Accessories</a> category</p> <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the BMX business.</p>

entries.title: Choppers
entries.description: This section is for bikes that are constructed for reasons other than performance or utility. The usual versions are choppers, but the category also includes species such as tallbikes, battle wagons, and amphibious pleasure craft.

entries.title: Custom_Frames
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to custom frames. <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the custom frames business.</p>

entries.title: Electric
entries.description: Manufacturers of electric-powered cycling equipment, commonly referred to as e-bikes.

entries.title: Folding_Bikes
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to folding bikes. <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the folding bikes business.</p>

entries.title: Handcycling
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to handcycles.</p> <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the handcycles.</p>

entries.title: Mountain_Bikes
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to mountain bike equipment</p>

entries.title: Pedicab
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to pedicab. <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the pedicab business.</p>

entries.title: Racing
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to bicycle racing in its many forms.</p>

entries.title: Recumbent
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to recumbent bicycles such as trikes and tandem recumbent bikes. <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the recumbent bicycles business.</p>

entries.title: Resources
entries.description: This category contains listings of factories and companies that provide parts or services to the bicycle industry. As a general rule, these companies do not sell directly to the public.

entries.title: Road_and_Touring
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to road, touring and classic bikes.</p>

entries.title: Tandems
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to tandems. <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the tandem business.</p>

entries.title: Tricycles
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to tricycles. <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the tricycles business.</p>

entries.title: Unicycles
entries.description: <p>This category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing products related to unicycles. <p>It is for appropriate for the sites of manufacturers, wholesalers, trade associations, and other sites about the unicycle business.</p>

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Includes links to wholesale distribution companies that serve the bicycle retailer and bicycle dealers.

entries.title: Darts
entries.description: Companies that manufacture darts, accessories and boards, but do not sell direct to the public, are listed in this category.

entries.title: Fencing
entries.description: Sites for fencing equipment manufacturers are listed in this category.

entries.title: Fishing
entries.description: For producers of fishing equipment that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/</a>

entries.title: Bait
entries.description: Find links to sites offering general and detailed information on worms, crickets, and other types of fishing bait. Sites strictly selling bait should be submitted to the Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Bait category.

entries.title: Bait_Containers
entries.description: For producers of bait containers that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Bait_Containers/">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Bait_Containers/</a>

entries.title: Electronics
entries.description: Electronic equipment specifically for sport recreational or commercial fishing and navigation, including manufacturer's sites and/or technical descriptive pages - but NOT to include GENERAL fishing tackle sites or malls.

entries.title: Fly_Fishing
entries.description: For producers of fly fishing tackle that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Fly_Fishing/">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Fly_Fishing/</a>

entries.title: Accessories
entries.description: For producers of fly fishing accessories that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Fly_Fishing/Accessories">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Fly_Fishing/Accessories</a>

entries.title: Flies
entries.description: For producers of flies that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="http://Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Fly_Fishing/Flies">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Fly_Fishing/Flies/</a>

entries.title: Fly_Tying_Material_and_Equipment
entries.description: Material, Accessories and Equipment needed for fly tying.

entries.title: Lines_and_Leaders
entries.description: For producers of fly fishing lines and leaders that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Fly_Fishing/Lines_and_Leaders/">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Fly_Fishing/Lines_and_Leaders/</a>

entries.title: Reels
entries.description: For producers of fly fishing reels that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site, reel repair shops, and reel component suppliers. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Fly_Fishing/Reels/">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Fly_Fishing/Reels/</a>

entries.title: Rods
entries.description: For producers of fly fishing rods that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Fly_Fishing/Rods">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Fly_Fishing/Rods</a>

entries.title: Custom
entries.description: Category for custom fly rod builders.

entries.title: Hooks
entries.description: For producers of fishing hooks that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Hooks/">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Hooks/</a> Hook manufacturers and reps invited, along with instructive hook selection and usage guides.

entries.title: Lines
entries.description: For producers of fishing lines that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Lines/">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Lines/</a>

entries.title: Lures
entries.description: For producers of fishing lures that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Lures/">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Lures/</a>

entries.title: Freshwater
entries.description: For producers of freshwater fishing lures that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Lures/Freshwater/">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Lures/Freshwater/</a>

entries.title: Saltwater
entries.description: For producers of saltwater fishing lures that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Lures/Saltwater/">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Lures/Saltwater/</a>

entries.title: Nets
entries.description: For producers of fishing nets that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Nets/">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Nets/</a>

entries.title: Reels
entries.description: For producers of reels that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site, reel repair shops, and reel component suppliers. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Reels/">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Reels/</a>

entries.title: Rods
entries.description: For producers of rods that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site, rod repair shops, and rod component suppliers. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Rods/">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Rods/</a>

entries.title: Components
entries.description: For producers of blanks, guides, reel seats, and other rod building components that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Rods/Components">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Rods/Components/</a>

entries.title: Rod_Holders
entries.description: For producers of rod holders that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site, rod repair shops, and rod component suppliers. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Rod_Holders/">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Rod_Holders/</a>

entries.title: Trolling
entries.description: For producers of fishing equipment us in trolling(such as downriggers, planer boards, dodgers, flashers and diving devices) that do *not* offer retail sales of their product from their site. Sites that offer retail sales from their site are listed at <A HREF="/Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Trolling/">Shopping/Recreation/Outdoors/Fishing/Trolling/</a>

entries.title: Fitness_Equipment
entries.description: This category lists sites for manufacturers of fitness equipment.

entries.title: Pilates_Method
entries.description: Companies and manufacturers specializing in Pilates apparatus and equipment.

entries.title: Football
entries.description: <p>The <b>Football</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing of products related to football sports such as soccer, American football and rugby.</p>

entries.title: Golf
entries.description: In these categories you will find a comprehensive listing of manufacturers of golf clubs, balls, accessories, and equipment. Companies who have products in more than one of the subcategories are listed in the main Golf: category. Please notify the editor of this category if you know of any additional sites which should be listed here. Each submittal will be reviewed on its own merit. Enjoy your adventure ... a great deal of time and money have been put into the development of many of these sites, which demonstrate "cutting edge" technology in web design .

entries.title: Accessories
entries.description: Makers of golf paraphernalia including but not limited to bags, gloves, carts, and motorized caddies.

entries.title: Cars,_Carts_and_Trolleys
entries.description: This category is for makers of products that are principally for moving golfers' equipment around a course. These products usually have wheels and may or may not be motorized. Other names of products that fit this category are 'motorcaddies' and 'buggies'.

entries.title: Balls
entries.description: Websites for companies who make golf balls exclusively.

entries.title: Clubs
entries.description: This category is for the sites of companies who <B>manufacture</B> and/or <B>market and distribute</B> <B>golf clubs</B> to retail dealers, distributors or wholesalers.

entries.title: Components
entries.description: <This category is for the sites of companies who <B>manufacture</B> and/or <B>market and distribute</B> <B>golf club components</B> to retail dealers, distributors or wholesalers.

entries.title: Heads
entries.description: Metal wood, iron, and putter club heads.

entries.title: Shafts
entries.description: OEM and aftermarket golf club shafts.

entries.title: Custom_Clubmakers
entries.description: <P>This category is for <B>clubmakers</B> presenting information about products and services online, but who handle fitting and do business with clients on a one-to-one basis at a physical location or locations, and not online.</P>

entries.title: Course_Supplies
entries.description: This category is for makers of golf course supplies, which may include signage, scorecards and yardage books, yardage markers, flags, etc.

entries.title: Practice_Equipment
entries.description: Makers of goods that are primarily used for golf practice, either at driving ranges, indoors, or for backyard activity.

entries.title: Putting
entries.description: This category is for products designed to help practice putting.

entries.title: Hockey
entries.description: Includes manufacturer, wholesaler and distributor of sporting goods used by consumers in various forms of hockey. Hockey is an team sport involving two teams who attempt to score the most goals against their opponents.

entries.title: Field
entries.description: Includes manufacturer, wholesaler and distributor of sporting goods used by consumers in field hockey.

entries.title: Ice_and_Roller
entries.description: Includes manufacturer, wholesaler and distributor of sporting goods used by consumers in ice or roller hockey.

entries.title: Kites
entries.description: Kite manufacturers.

entries.title: Distributors
entries.description: For the wholesale distribution of kites and accessories to resellers.

entries.title: Lacrosse
entries.description: This category lists sites for manufacturers of lacrosse equipment who do not sell directly to the public.

entries.title: Laser_Games
entries.description: This category includes industries and companies focused on manufacturing, distributing and marketing laser games equipment such as vests and guns as well as coin-operated and other arena equipment.

entries.title: Martial_Arts
entries.description: The <b>Martial Arts</b> category includes companies focused on manufacturing, distributing and marketing finished products that will be used by the general public.

entries.title: Multiple_Sports
entries.description: <p>The <b>Multiple Sports</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing of sporting goods related to two or more sports.</p>

entries.title: Accessories
entries.description: <p>The <b>Accessories</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing accessories.</P>

entries.title: Electronics
entries.description: <p>The <b>Electronics</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing electronics products such as timing and lightning detectors.<p>

entries.title: Game_Balls
entries.description: <p>The <b>Game Balls</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing of products related to sports which use balls like handball, volleyball, baseball, softball, basketball, soccer, football, racquetball, tennis, etc...</p>

entries.title: Nets
entries.description: <p>The <b>Nets</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing of nets, post and related products.</p>

entries.title: Protection
entries.description: <p>The <b>Protection</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing of protection equipment.<p>

entries.title: Racquets
entries.description: <p>The <b>Racquets</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing of products related to racquets.<p>

entries.title: Scoreboards
entries.description: <p>The <b>Scoreboards</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing of products related to mechanical and electronic scoreboards.<p>

entries.title: Training
entries.description: <p>The <b>Training</b> category focuses on the business of manufacturing, distributing, and marketing of products related to training equipment.</p>

entries.title: Skydiving
entries.description: Manufacturers of skydiving related equipment. <p> Note that skydiving shops which do not manufacture equipment are in <a href="/Shopping/Recreation_and_Hobbies/Outdoors/Skydiving/">Shopping: Recreation and Hobbies: Outdoors: Skydiving</a>. <p> Skydiving and parachuting are the same thing.

entries.title: Altimeters
entries.description: Manufacturers of skydiving altimeters. <p> An altimeter tells you how far above the ground you are. This is essential information so that you can open your parachute before you hit the ground. <p> "Audible altimeters" make a sound at a pre-programmed height(s), e.g. the height where you should pull your parachute, or for formation skydivers "break-off" height where you start moving away from the other skydivers to prevent mid-air collisions when you open your parachute. <p> (Note that "Skydiving" and "Parachuting" mean the same thing).

entries.title: Jumpsuits
entries.description: Manufacturers of jumpsuits. (Clothes you wear while skydiving). <p> Note that skydiving shops which do not manufacture anything are in <a href="/Shopping/Recreation_and_Hobbies/Outdoors/Skydiving/">Shopping: Recreation and Hobbies: Outdoors: Skydiving</a>. <p> Skydiving and parachuting are the same thing.

entries.title: Rigs
entries.description: Manufacturers of rigs (parachutes) for skydiving. <p> A rig consists of a container, harness, one or two canopies, and possibly an AAD. <p> "Containers" are the backpack-like things that your "canopies" (parachutes) are kept in when you jump out of a plane. <p> "Harnesses" are the straps that keep the container (and canopy) attached to you. Most containers are permanently attached to a harness. <p> A "canopy" is the technical term for the actual parachute. The "container" is not part of the canopy, and is often purchased separately. <p> Most containers intended for sports parachuting hold two canopies, a main and a reserve. This means that if there is a problem with the main canopy, you can cut it away and open the reserve. <p> An "AAD" or "Automatic Activation Device" is a safety device to automatically open your reserve parachute at the last moment if you do not open your parachute normally. <p> (Note that "Skydiving" and "Parachuting" mean the same thing).

entries.title: Automatic_Activation_Devices
entries.description: Manufacturers of "Automatic Activation Devices" ("AADs"). An AAD opens your reserve parachute automatically at a preset height, if you are still in freefall. This is intended as a last resort safety measure, if something goes wrong and you are physically or mentally unable to open the parachute.

entries.title: Canopies
entries.description: Manufacturers of skydiving canopies. <p> A "canopy" is the technical term for a parachute. The "container", which is worn like a backpack and holds the canopies, is not part of the canopy, and is often purchased separately. <p> Most containers intended for sports parachuting hold two canopies, a main and a reserve. This means that if there is a problem with the main canopy, you can cut it away and open the reserve. <p> (Note that "Skydiving" and "Parachuting" mean the same thing).

entries.title: Containers_and_Harnesses
entries.description: Manufacturers of Containers and Harnesses for skydiving. "Containers" are the backpack-like things that your "canopies" (parachutes) are kept in when you jump out of a plane. "Harnesses" are the straps that keep the container (and canopy) attached to you. Most containers are permanently attached to a harness, hence this is just one category. (Note that "Skydiving" and "Parachuting" mean the same thing).

entries.title: Skyboards
entries.description: Manufacturers of skyboards. <p> At first glance, skyboards look similar to surfboards. The obvious difference is that you play with them in freefall! The construction is also quite different.

entries.title: Wood

entries.title: Parts_and_Supplies
entries.description: Manufacturers of parts and supplies for boats, watercraft, marine engines and related accessories.

entries.title: Personal_Watercraft
entries.description: These sites offer personal watercraft aftermarket parts, accessories or services. Prices are not listed on the site, but site owners can be contacted by email, phone, fax, or regular mail.

entries.title: Canoes_and_Kayaks

entries.title: Sub_Sea
