entries.title: Cooperatives

translations.tha: สหกรณ์

entries.description: Cooperatives (also called co-ops) are a form of business ownership that is practiced all over the world. The most common types of cooperatives are worker-owned and consumer-owned. Most cooperatives adhere to seven principles: <ul> <li>Voluntary and Open Membership</li> <li>Democratic Member Control</li> <li>Member Economic Participation</li> <li>Autonomy and Independence</li> <li>Education, Training and Information</li> <li>Co-operation among Co-operatives</li> <li>Concern for Community</li> </ul><div class="co_ops"> <p>Co-ops include:</p> <p><a href="/Business/Agriculture_and_Forestry/Cooperatives/">Agricultural:</a> farms, feed suppliers, and seed banks.</p> <p><a href="/Business/Cooperatives/Computer_and_Internet/">Computer and Internet:</a> ISPs, web hosting, and computer design collectives </p> <p><a href="/Business/Energy_and_Environment/Electricity/Cooperatives/">Energy:</a> utility companies and power providers </p> <p><a href="/Business/Financial_Services/Cooperatives/"> Financial:</a> banks, <a href="/Business/Financial_Services/Banking_Services/Credit_Unions/">credit unions</a>, investors, insurers, and mortgage brokers </p> <p><a href="/Business/Food_and_Related_Products/Cooperatives/">Food Cooperatives:</a> health-food stores and bulk food sharing programs </p> <p><a href="/Business/Real_Estate/Residential/Cooperatives/"> Housing:</a> housing cooperatives and intentional communities. </p> <p><a href="/Arts/Visual_Arts/Collectives/">Visual Arts:</a> groups of artists, both living and working together. </p> </div>

entries.title: Computer_and_Internet
entries.description: Web sites of computer and / or internet related companies making use of a cooperative model of business.

entries.title: Development_Agencies
entries.description: Organizations to assist co-op businesses, often particularly in the formation of new co-ops. They are often referred to as CDAs.

entries.title: Education_and_Training
entries.description: Organizations that study co-operatives and co-operative values, or serve to educate people on co-operative principles.

entries.title: Customer_Service
entries.description: The Customer Service category is a directory of resource sites containing information related to the broad field of customer service (including customer satisfaction, technical support, etc.). This category will contain a combination of informational sites broadly related to customer service theory and its practical application, of interest to customer service related professionals in all industries and occupations. It will also contain resource listings of practitioners (companies, governmental, academic) engaged in some aspect of customer service (consulting, facilitation, training, etc.). Check subdirectories for specific topics.

entries.title: Conferences
entries.description: Tools, services & resources for that apply specifically to the Customer Service industry.

entries.title: Consulting
entries.description: This category is for web sites related to consultants specializing in customer service.

entries.title: Education_and_Training
entries.description: This category lists businesses and individuals which specialize in customer service education and training.

entries.title: Mystery_Shopping
entries.description: Mystery shopping is a service provided to businesses to give them feedback on the quality of their services, businesses, websites and/or personnel. Generally this is done by employing persons who visit the business, conduct transactions, and then provide a report on their experiences. Services should involve some kind of interpersonal contact, customarily in-person or by telephone. Web-only mystery shopping is a possibility as well. <p> This category is NOT for sites which essentially sell a list of mystery shopping companies or otherwise claim to have some "secret" to success as a mystery shopper for the right price.

entries.title: Directories
entries.description: The <b>Business Directories</b> category only lists business directories which span more than a single continent and cover multiple business industries. <p><b>Excluded</b> from this category are:</p> <ul> <li>Industry-specific directories are listed according to the <a href="/Business/">industry which they cover</a>. For example, a directory of hospitality industry businesses would be listed in <a href="/Business/Hospitality/Directories/">Business: Hospitality: Directories</a>.</li> <li>Regionally-specific business directories (local, state/province, or national) are listed according to the <a href="/Regional/">geographic area which they cover</a>. For example, a state business directory would be listed in the category for the state it serves.</li> </ul>

entries.title: E-Commerce

translations.tha: พาณิชย์อิเล็กทรอนิกส์

entries.description: E-Commerce, or electronic commerce, is defined as the conduct of business and financial transactions by electronic means. It is the use of Internet technologies to bring together customers, business, partners, suppliers and employees. This category focuses on the many aspects of conducting business using the Internet and the World Wide Web: Marketing, Strategy, Training, Research, Practice, and Services, among other topics that are related to Electronic Commerce.

entries.title: International_Associations
entries.description: A listing of international associations focused on the issues of e-commerce.

entries.title: Conferences
entries.description: This category lists sites announcing Conferences and Seminars where the main focus is e-commerce, e-business and related areas. Both sites announcing single events and sites covering series of events are listed.

entries.title: Consulting
entries.description: This category contains consulting companies that have a clearly identifiable focus on providing e-commerce consulting services. Companies that primarily focus on providing e-commerce technologies (software) should be categorized elsewhere.

entries.title: Software_Developers
entries.description: Companies and consultants providing software development services to businesses.

translations.por: Gestão de Relacionamento com o Cliente

entries.title: Developers

entries.title: Database_Applications
entries.description: This category is for developers of database solutions as it relates to e-commerce. Includes database design, implementation and integration into a web site.

entries.title: Managed_Sites
entries.description: This subcategory is intended for turn-key ecommerce developers who manage and maintain the sites they develop for their customers.

entries.title: Sectors
entries.description: Information related to companies classified by economic sectors. There will include to kinds of sectors: - Vertical markets, related to specific activities they create closed markets (ie. automotive, distribution, sanitary, etc.) - Horizontal markets, related mainly to services that are given in many different vertical markets (ie. financial services, comms, etc.)

entries.title: Transport-logistics
entries.description: Information related to companies of the transportation and logistics sector.

entries.description: Links to college and university (.edu) web sites dealing with e-commerce / e-business education degree programs, research centers, and academic course web sites.

entries.title: Centers
entries.description: Educational research centers (.edu) focused on e-commerce or e-business issues.

entries.title: Courses
entries.description: Links to university course web sites (.edu or .org) on e-commerce and e-business.

entries.title: Marketplaces
entries.description: E-commerce marketplaces facilitate interactions and transactions between buyers and sellers within a specific industry or industries.

entries.title: Industrial
entries.description: Industrial marketplaces facilitate interactions and transactions between buyers and sellers within industries such as steel.

entries.title: Services
entries.description: Companies, solutions and services that enable eMarketplaces.

entries.title: Technology
entries.description: An eMarketplace is essentially an eCommerce system allowing many-to-many trading over the Internet. Multiple suppliers link with multiple buyers, allowing buyers to select the most appropriate or cost-effective source of products and services.

entries.title: Standards_and_Protocols
entries.description: All the technologies and standards, related to EDI (Electronic Data Interchange) and Business to Business.

entries.title: Strategy
entries.description: This category is for sites that provide resources and information on e-commerce strategy and sites related to businesses that only specialize in e-commerce strategy.

entries.title: Education_and_Training

translations.tha: การฝึกอบรม

entries.description: Broad category of business covering Training as well as Schools. Category includes numerous areas of training and schools that businesses provide, ranging from Aviation to Zookeeping. See also <a href="/Reference/Education/"> Education</a> for formal education opportunities.

entries.title: Business_Development
entries.description: Category for businesses which sole function is to improve, and/or educate other businesses for profit. The goal of the businesses in this category is to develop other businesses. For sites devoted to human resources, go to the <A HREF="/Business/Human_Resources/Education_and_Training/"> Human_Resources/Education_and_Training <A> category.

entries.title: Driving
entries.description: For driving or traffic school program web sites, only sites with an original state-approved program will be accepted. Sites that simply refer students to another driving or traffic school program that is already listed will be deemed as "mirror sites" and will not be accepted. Affiliate sites will not be listed. This category will also accept web sites of official regulating bodies for the traffic school industry. Sites for "Driving Schools" and "Traffic Schools" should be submitted to the appropriate category. LIST UK SITES TO THE APPROPRIATE LOCALITY, NOT HERE

entries.title: Advanced_Driver_Training
entries.description: For Driving Schools which specialize in advanced behind the wheel training for persons who already possess a license.

entries.title: Driving_Schools
entries.description: Schools offering approved on-road learn to drive programs, primarily for teenagers or other new drivers.

entries.title: Traffic_Schools
entries.description: This category is for traffic school web sites and for the web sites of traffic school regulating bodies. A "traffic school" is primarily in the business of ticket remediation, court-appointed retraining or points reduction programs.

entries.title: Education
entries.description: This category contains commercial sites that focus on training those who educate.

entries.title: CPR_and_First_Aid
entries.description: Find CPR, first aid, and other safety training

entries.title: Manual_Skills
entries.description: This category is for businesses that are devoted to the training and development of a manual skills occupation.

entries.title: Team_Building
entries.description: Team building focuses on training teams through experiential learning. Most team building companies fall into one of the following categories: 1. Fun and games (similar to corporate entertainment, but done in teams with the intent to enhance team performance), 2. Outdoor adventures (sailing, rock-climbing, river rafting, etc. done as team activities) and 3. Management training and development. True team building focuses on using the training approach to strengthen, build and increase team performance.

entries.title: Technology
entries.description: Listings for those looking for training and education in technology.

entries.title: Electronics_and_Electrical

translations.tha: อิเล็กทรอนิกส์และอุปกรณ์ไฟฟ้า
translations.jpn: 電機・エレクトロニクス

entries.description: <p>This <b>Electronics and Electrical</b> sector category includes industries and companies that manufacturer electronic and electrical components, equipment, and hardware, and manufacturers of materials, supplies, tools, components and equipment that are specific to the manufacture of electronics and electrical components. <p>Sites for industries and companies that manufacture, distribute and sell finished electronics and electrical products (e.g. home appliances, radios, TVs, etc.) are not listed here. <P>Only a few companies in the world qualify to be listed on the main page. Please submit your company's primary URL to the category that represents your companies primary focus. If you believe you have been listed inappropriately please submit a feedback to the listed editor(s).

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: This category lists organizations, industry trade groups, foundations, and standards setting bodies in the electronics and electrical industries. The primary function of an organization listed here should be to organize, provide information about, or promote a field in the electrical industry, or provide non-profit services to industry members. <table bgcolor="#ffffcc" cellpadding=6 border="0"> <tr><td> <small>Before submitting your site, please review the <a href="/Business/desc.html">Guidelines for Submitting a Site</a>.</small> </td></tr> </table> </p>

entries.title: Commercial_and_Industrial_Products
entries.description: This category will list companies that manufacture and service products for commercial and industrial applications.

entries.title: Components
entries.description: This category will list companies that specialize in the manufacture and support of the Semiconductor Industry which includes manufacturers of equipment and supplies, engineering, tooling, wholesalers, distributors, contract manufacturers, etc. URLs that contain only information about semiconductors and their use should be submitted to Science/Technology/Electronics/Semiconductors.

entries.title: Capacitors
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of capacitors.

entries.title: Resistors
entries.description: <table border=0 cellpadding=12 width="75%" bgcolor="#F0F0DF"> <tr> <td>This category is for manufacturers of resistors Distributors should be placed in : <b>Business: Industries: Manufacturing: Electronics: Distributors and Vendors: Components: Passive </b></td> </tr> </table>

entries.title: Crystals
entries.description: This category is for crystals oscillators, resonators and oscillators modules.

entries.title: Filters
entries.description: Category for manufacturers of electronic filters.

entries.title: Lamps_and_Indicators
entries.description: Category for the manufacturers of lamps and light indicators used as a component part of a system.

entries.title: Microwave
entries.description: This category lists professional companies involved in the microwave industry. The term microwave is often defined as the part of the electromagnetic spectrum from 300 MHz to 300 GHz. However, in the common venacular, the microwave band is often extended to encompass much higher frequencies. This band is further subdivided into the millimeter-wave band extending from 30-300 GHz and the submillimeter-wave band above 300 GHz.

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: This category will list engineers and engineering companies in the field of RF and Microwave design.

entries.title: Piezo_Transducers
entries.description: This category includes listings for manufacturers of acoustic transducers and sensors. Distributors should be placed in : Business: Industries: Manufacturing: Electronics: Distributors and Vendors

entries.title: Contract_Manufacturing
entries.description: This category contains companies that manufacture custom semiconductors, semiconductor packaging, or fabricate wafers on a contract basis.

entries.title: Discrete
entries.description: This category is for the manufacturers of discrete semiconductor devices. For example diodes and FETs. Also the place for arrays of similar discrete components in one device. The place for devices with more than one type of device is the Integrated Circuits category.

entries.title: Integrated_Circuits
entries.description: This category includes listings for manufacturers of electronic integrated circuits.

entries.title: Digital
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers and designers of digital integrated circuits of all flavors.

entries.title: Linear
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers and designers of analog integrated circuits of all flavors.

entries.title: Mixed_Signal
entries.description: This category is for sites that deal exclusively with mixed signal integrated circuits (ICs). Sites that deal with a combination of mixed signal AND other types of ICs (such as analog or digital) will be found in a higher category.

entries.title: Materials_and_Supplies
entries.description: This category will list companies that manufacture or distribute materials or supplies used in the manufacture of semiconductors.

entries.title: Wafer
entries.description: This category will list companies that produce and support the production on wafer products for the electronics industry.

entries.title: Automated_Testing_Systems
entries.description: This category will list companies that manufacture, sell and support Automated Test Systems used in the manufacture of Semiconductors.

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: This category will list companies that support the semiconductor processing industry.

entries.title: Manufacturers_Representatives
entries.description: This category will list Manufacturers Representatives for Semiconductor equipment and supplies.

entries.title: Used_Equipment
entries.description: Used semiconductor equipment or refurbish

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Distributors and retailers of new semiconductor and wafer fabrication and processing equipment used in creating silicon wafers or transforming them into integrated circuits. Equipment includes but is not limited to photolithography, etching, diffusion and deposition, dicing, and bonding machines.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category contains distributors, vendors and manufacturer's representatives of discrete and integrated circuit (IC) semiconductors. Discrete semiconductors include diode, magnetron, module, thermionic emission valves, thyristor, transistor and triacs. ICs include amplifiers, computational, drivers and interface, logic, memory, power supply and control, RF and video function, signal conversion, signal routing and conditioning and timing functions.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category is for vendors and distributors of components used during the manufacture of electronic products.

entries.title: Hardware
entries.description: This category contains distributors, vendors and manufacturer's representatives of fuses and fuseholders, interconnect products, speakers, relays and switches. Manufacturers of these components should submit to the particular category in Business/Industries/Manufacturing/Electronics

entries.title: Passives
entries.description: This category contains distributors and vendors of passive circuit elements or components. Passive components include resistors, capacitors and inductors, transformers and electrical fuses. Manufacturers of passive components should submit to: Business: Electronics_and_Electrical: Components Distributors of passive components used primarily for power electronics or the electrical industry should submit to the relevant sub-category in: Business: Construction and Maintenance: Materials and Supplies: Electrical: Wholesale and Distribution Broadline electronic component distributors should submit to Business: Electronics and Electrical: Components: Wholesale and Distribution

entries.title: Contract_Manufacturing
entries.description: This category is for companies whose primary focus is the production of electronics equipment and components on a contract basis, from prototype to production quantities. Some examples of sites accepted are OEM computer manufacturers, makers of custom LCDs, and companies that offer a combination of PCB assembly and chassis manufacturing. This category is not intended for companies which primarily offer standard or off-the-shelf product lines, or who only offer design services.

entries.title: Brokers_and_Marketplaces
entries.description: This category contains companies that locate manufacturers to meet the requirements of a contract electronics Request For Quote (RFQ) or Request For Proposal (RFP).

entries.title: Directories
entries.description: This category includes web sites that contain directories or search engines specialized in the area of contract manufacturing or makers of custom electronic equipment.

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: This category will list companies that provide engineering and design service to the contract manufacturing industry. Companies the both design and manufacture products will not be listed in this category.

entries.title: Printed_Circuit_Boards
entries.description: This category contains vendors and distributors of Printed Circuit Boards. A printed circuit board (PCB) is a rigid or flexible panel of fiberglass, teflon, or other insulating substrate that contains layers of interconnecting conductive tracks onto which electronic components are mounted to create an electronic circuit.

entries.title: Assembly
entries.description: This category covers electronics contract manufacturing companies and related links that apply to the assembly of printed circuit boards. PCB Assembly involves placing and securing - typically by soldering - the electrical and electronic components onto the bare printed circuit board.

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: This category will list companies that design printed circuit boards.

entries.title: Fabrication
entries.description: This category lists companies that manufacture base printed circuit boards out of FR4, teflon, or other substrate material, using Gerber artwork, drill files, and/or other CAD designs. The final product is a board that contains no components (often called "unpopulated").

entries.title: Flexible_Boards_and_Interconnects
entries.description: This category contains companies that manufacture flexible circuit boards (flex boards), combination rigid-flex boards, or special wire or mechanical connectors that contain circuits that bend or otherwise cannot be made on flat stable substrates.

entries.title: Prototype
entries.description: This category is for the manufacture of electronic circuit board, but specializing in prototyping. For submitters: you cannot be in both all categories, pick the one which best suits your business.

entries.title: Tools_and_Equipment
entries.description: Manufacturers and sellers of industrial machines used to manufacture printed circuit boards (PCB). This includes but is not limited to drilling machines, reflow ovens, etc.

entries.title: Automated_Test_Systems
entries.description: This category will list companies that manufacture production test equipment for the PCB industry. It will also list the companies that support these equipment manufacturers.

entries.title: Component_Placement
entries.description: Equipment related to placing components onto fabricated circuit boards prior to soldering. This includes pick and place machines, chip shooters, and part feeders.

entries.title: Drills_and_Routers
entries.description: Companies that manufacture, distribute, service, or provide equipment for drills, routers, cutters, engravers, and groove and v-cut makers. This also includes companies dealing with drill and router bits.

entries.title: Resources
entries.description: This category will list URLs for informational resources and sites that provide a comprehensive overview of routers used for PCB manufacture.

entries.title: Tool_Bits_and_Consumables
entries.description: For manufacturers and distributors of tool bits and consumables for the machining (drilling and routing) of printed circuit boards.

entries.title: Pallets_and_Fixtures
entries.description: Companies that manufacture, sell, or service devices that hold printed circuit boards during the assembly process. This includes pallets, trays, carriers, cooling racks, carts, and fixtures.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Distributors, buyers, sellers, and retailers of printed circuit board (PCB) fabrication and assembly equipment.

entries.title: Screen_Printing
entries.description: This category will list companies that provide contract printing and painting services to the electronic and electrical industries.

entries.title: Control_Systems
entries.description: Includes listings for manufacturers of control systems and components such as process control systems, industrial controls and appliance controls. These are sub-assemblies and not completed products.

entries.title: CNC_Computer_Numerical_Controls
entries.description: CNC industrial control systems, are Numerically Controlled by dedicated computer based processing. These are mainly found in lathes, machining centres, punches, small presses, EDM (electrical discharge machines), water jet cutting machines, etc. The systems are generic off the shelve systems.

entries.title: Repair
entries.description: Offers in-house repairs on CNC systems.

entries.title: Electrical_Panel_Builders
entries.description: Engineering, design, procurement, and construction of electrical panels is performed by these manufacturers.

entries.title: Hazardous
entries.description: This category will list manufacturer of controls that are rated to operate in hazardous environments and the companies that support these manufacturers.

entries.title: Industrial
entries.description: This category lists URL for companies that provide engineering, design, procurement, and construction of electrical control systems for the equipment used in factories.

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: This category will list the URLs of companies that design and integrate electrical control systems and do not build the controls.

entries.title: Remote_and_Wireless_Controls
entries.description: For various types of remote handset, joystick, or wireless mobile system that is wireless and used to control industrial machinery. Including PLC's, gantries, cranes, etc.

entries.title: Microcontroller
entries.description: This category will list manufacturers of microcontrollers, boards and accessories as well as the companies that support microcontroller companies.

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: This category will list companies that provide engineering design for embedded systems.

entries.title: Process_Control
entries.description: This category will list companies that manufacture, distribute and sell electrical and electronic process control systems. It will not list the individual instrumentation and electromechanical components which are listed in other categories.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category will list distributors and wholesalers of process control systems and components.

entries.title: Robotics
entries.description: This category lists URLs for companies that provide engineering, design, procurement, and construction of robotic control systems.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category will list companies that resell electrical and electronic control systems and components without adding value.

entries.title: Education_and_Training
entries.description: This category will list institutes, companies and individuals that provide education and training to the Electronic and Electrical industry. This category will also list the companies that provide services to the education and training companies listed here.

entries.title: Electromechanical
entries.description: This category will list manufacturers of devices and parts which are electrical/electronic and mechanical in nature.

entries.title: Connectors_and_Terminals
entries.description: Includes sockets and terminals, terminal boards and blocks, cable to cable, rack, and panel connectors, PCB and flat cable connectors, jacks, plugs, pins, and adapters.

entries.title: Contract_Manufacturing
entries.description: This category contains companies that manufacture mechanical structures out of plastic or metal that are integrated with electronics beyond a standard chassis.

entries.title: Electric_Motors
entries.description: Companies that design, manufacture or distribute motors and motion control products. Sub-categories also include engineering services, motor component manufacturers, motor manufacturing equipment makers, and motor repair facilities.

entries.title: Components
entries.description: This section is for manufactured components and/or accessories of DC or AC motors, such as brushes, commutators, brakes, gearheads, laminations, brush assemblies, encoders etc.

entries.title: Controls
entries.description: Drives and Controls for AC or DC motors, including starters, switches, and motor specific switchgear.

entries.title: DC
entries.description: DC Servo and stepper motor manufacturers; but not distributors.

entries.title: Linear_Motors
entries.description: Linear Drives and Systems

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: This category will list engineering and consulting companies that provide services to the Electric Motor industry and users.

entries.title: Manufacturing_Equipment
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of equipment used in the manufacture, testing, or repair of electric motors, such as winders, fluidizers, commutator cutters, balancers, magnetizers, hy-pot testers, etc.

entries.title: Motorized_Mechanisms
entries.description: More than just a motor or integral gearmotor; websites in this subcategory are an integral design that includes a motor, but are specifically designed for a purpose such as lifting or rolling. This category exists for mechanisms that just cannot be placed in another category. If a more appropriate category is found for the particular mechanism, it should be moved.

entries.title: Repair
entries.description: Repair, rewind, rebuild or sell used motors, also includes repair of motor drives and controls. Could include sale of new equipment if the repair shop also is a distributor, but if site is more distributor than repair, will be placed in one not both. These two sites (repair and distributor) are only here because people looking for new motors might also be looking for used or repair and having a sub-site under manufacturing for repair and distributors is convenient for searchers since there is not a good hierarchy like this for non-manufactured goods.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Distributors of electric motors, controls, and ancillary components. Not the Manufacturing Company itself, which can be found in other subcategories under Business/Industries/Manufacturing/Electrical/Electric Motors.

entries.title: Hardware
entries.description: This category includes listings for manufacturers of interconnections, packaging, and hardware.

entries.title: Enclosures_and_Cabinets
entries.description: Manufacturers of chassis and enclosures for electrical and electronic equipment, plus server and telecom rack cabinets and accessories for datacenter environments.

entries.title: Mica_Insulators
entries.description: This category will list the companies that produce mica insulation products for use in the electronic and electrical industries.

entries.title: Interconnection_Systems
entries.description: Includes backpanels, card holders, wiring and packaging systems, high density interconnection products, plug-in and programming boards, systems, and switching matrices, bus bars and systems.

entries.title: Mechanical_Components
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of mechanical components used in association with electronics systems, including belts and pulleys, screws and fasteners, panel hardware, bezels and panels, knobs and dials, and similar components.

entries.title: Prototype_Kits_and_Aids
entries.description: Includes boards, kits, and design aids, PCB materials and accessories such as copper clad laminates, negative and positive resist boards, positive and negative artwork appliques and tapes. Manufacturers providing custom printed circuit boards in prototype to production quantities are listed in the <a href=http://dmoz.org/Business/Electronics_and_Electrical/Contract_Manufacturers/Printed_Circuit_Boards/><b>Contract Manufacturers</b></a> category.

entries.title: Shields_and_Shielding
entries.description: Includes magnetic, RF, radiation, and mechanical shielding products, wire mesh and conductive gaskets, laminates, and alloys.

entries.title: Tools_and_Kits
entries.description: Includes manual and power tools and kits such as crimpers and dies, insertion and removal tools, connector service and assembly kits, cleavers and strippers, as well as custom designed and application specific tools.

entries.title: Relays_and_Solenoids
entries.description: Manufacturers of all types of relays and solenoids, solid state relays also included.

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: This category will list engineering firms that provide services to relay and solenoid manufacturers.

entries.title: Switches
entries.description: Manufacturers of electrical, electronic, and mechanical switches. This includes all types of mechanical switches, reed switches, and proximity switches.

entries.title: Proximity_Switches
entries.description: Manufacturers of proximity switches. This includes all types of capacitance sensors as well as any electronic based proximity switches.

entries.title: Reed_Switches
entries.description: Manufacturers of all types of reed switches. Manufacturers of products such as reed sensors and other reed based products, which use reed switches as the primary component will also be listed.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category will list companies that purchase products from Producers and Manufacturers in bulk and resell it without transformation to re-sellers. The Wholesalers and Distributors that will be listed in this category are associated with Electromechanical devises. Companies that provide services to these Wholesalers and Distributors will be listed here. This category will not list Manufacturers' Representatives and Retailers.

entries.title: Employment
entries.description: This category lists sites that offer job resources in the Electronics and Electrical industries. Sites include job search sites, staffing services, recruiters, and resumes of individuals seeking jobs.

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: <p><a href="/Business/Electronics_and_Electrical/Engineering/"><u><b>Electrical Engineering</b></u></a> <br> <br> This category is a combination of company listings and informational/resource Web sites for Electrical Engineering.</p> <p>The main Engineering category page contains only listings of informational/resource web sites of interest to Engineers. Informational resources specific to a certain Engineering field are listed under that sub-category.</p> <p>No companies are listed directly under Engineering, but are listed in their most appropriate subcategories of Engineering, such as Engineering:Electrical.</p> <table bgcolor="#ffffcc" cellpadding="6" border="0"> <tr> <td><small><b>Before submitting your site, please review the <a href="/Business/desc.html">Guidelines for Submitting a Site</a>.</b></small> </td> </tr> </table> <p>If you do not see a subcategory that you think should be included included in <strong>Business:Industries:Engineering</strong>,<br> please email an Editor in the <a href="/Business/">Business</a>: or <a href="/Business/Electronics_and_Electrical/">Business/Electronics_and_Electrical</a> section and ask them to consider including the new subcategory. (You may find a list of editors at the bottom of the category pages.)</p>

entries.title: Construction_and_Maintenance
entries.description: This category will list companies and consultants that specialize in electrical engineering for buildings and power distribution systems.

entries.title: Structural_Health
entries.description: This category will list companies that provide structural health systems and services for buildings, bridges and other major structures.

entries.title: Individual_Resumes
entries.description: Individual Resumes of Electrical and Electronics Engineers, Technicians, Managers, Consultants, and anyone else who works in or wishes to work in electronics engineering.

entries.title: Product_Development
entries.description: This category will list engineering firms that develop electronic and electrical products for clients.

entries.title: Pulsed_Power
entries.description: Pulse Power Technology involves the use of high voltage and high current systems, in many commercial activities that require the delivery of high peak powers. By its general nature, Pulsed Power Science is a technology with many applications including medical, environmental, industrial, defense and research applications. The basic principles of pulsed power involve the storage of energy over relatively long timescales (ms to secs) and the subsequent pulsed release of this energy in a controlled manner into a specific load, in a faster time (100's ps to ms). This results in very high peak powers (MW to TW). The energy switched in a single pulse can range from less than 1 J to MJ. Pulsed power systems can also range from single shot devices to high repetition rate systems, switching at up to 1 MHz rep-rates.

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: This category will list engineers and engineering firms dealing with heating and cooling equipment.

entries.title: Thermoelectric
entries.description: This category will list companies that manufacture, distribute, integrate and support thermoelectric applications.

entries.title: Human_Interfaces
entries.description: This category will list companies that manufacture products that interface humans with machines and electronic devices. This category will also list companies that support this industry such as engineers, consultants, distributors, associations, etc.

entries.title: Displays_and_Readout
entries.description: Category for the manufacturers of displays used as a component part of a system.

entries.title: Panel_Meters
entries.description: Includes listings for manufacturers of general function and special purpose digital and analog panel meters.

entries.title: Import_and_Export
entries.description: This category will list companies that provide import or export services to manufactures, distributors or retailers of electronic and electrical components. This is the general category for all import and export related service companies, including agents, traders, distributors, consultants, web sites, trade portals and other intermediaries. All import/export service related sites from every world region are welcome to list in this category to promote products or services available or sought for international purchase.

entries.title: Instrumentation
entries.description: Instrumentation of industrial processes provides measurement and automation functionality.

entries.title: Alarm_Annunciators
entries.description: This category will list the companies that manufacture annunciators for the process and instrumentation industries.

entries.title: Data_Acquisition_and_Control
entries.description: Companies manufacturing or installing equipment for the automatic collection of data from sensors and instruments, and the remote control of process equipment such as lights, valves, heating and cooling chambers, etc. This includes but is not limited to SCADA systems. Examples of data acquisition include temperature, pressure, flow, strain, position, depth and pollutants.

entries.title: Data_Communications
entries.description: Manufacturers primarily making the communications wiring, adaptors and transmitters used in data acquisition and control applications.

entries.title: Software
entries.description: For sites dealing primarily with data acquisition and control software.

entries.title: Telemetry
entries.description: Automatic measurement and transmission of data by wire, radio, or other means from remote sources

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: This category will list companies that provide engineering services to instrumentation manufacturing companies. Companies that manufacture a product will not be listed in this category.

entries.title: Flow
entries.description: Flow measurement devices are used in industrial processes.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category will list companies that purchase products from Producers and Manufacturers in bulk and resell it without transformation to re-sellers. The Wholesalers and Distributors that will be listed in this category are associated with the flow instrumentation industry. Companies that provide services to these Wholesalers and Distributors will be listed here. This category will not list Manufacturers' Representatives, Retailers.

entries.title: Flow_Detection_and_Analysis
entries.description: Detection of flow and analysis of flow.

entries.title: Force,_Weight,_Torque
entries.description: Listing of manufacturers of transducers and sending units for force, weight and torque used for the instrumentation of industrial processes.

entries.title: LVDT
entries.description: This category will list companies that manufacture LVDTs and companies that support the manufacture and sales of LVDTs.

entries.title: Manufacturers'_Representatives
entries.description: Manufactures Representatives of equipment and services for the instrumentation of industrial processes.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category will list companies that purchase products from Producers and Manufacturers in bulk and resell it without transformation to re-sellers. The Wholesalers and Distributors that will be listed in this category are associated with the temperature measurement industry. Companies that provide services to these Wholesalers and Distributors will be listed here. This category will not list Manufacturers' Representatives, Retailers.

entries.title: Viscometer
entries.description: This category will list companies that manufacture instrumentation that measure viscosity in a process.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category will list companies that purchase products from Producers and Manufacturers in bulk and resell it without transformation to re-sellers. The Wholesalers and Distributors that will be listed in this category are associated with industrial instrumentation. Companies that provide services to these Wholesalers and Distributors will be listed here. This category will not list Manufacturers' Representatives or Retailers.

entries.title: Manufacturers'_Representatives
entries.description: This category lists companies that are Manufacturers Representatives of one or more manufacturing companies.

entries.title: Marketing_and_Advertising
entries.description: This category lists Marketing and PR firms focusing on the Electronics and/or Electrical market sector.

entries.title: News_and_Media
entries.description: For online and printed publications, including newsletters, industry magazines, and books.

entries.title: Optoelectronics_and_Fiber
entries.description: Optoelectronics is the joint application of optics and electronics. The optoelectronic industry produces technologies such as optical semiconductor technology, fiber optics, and laser-based optical storage technologies. Products of the industry include components such as optic fibers, and equipment such as optical scanners, disk drives, and digital cameras. Applications of optoelectronic technology can be found in telecommunications, computer and office equipment, and the home electronic industries. (Description derived from the Optoelectronics Industry Development Association's Web Site, http://www.oida.org/)

entries.title: Lasers
entries.description: This category contains sites related to the manufacture, supply, and service of a broad spectrum of laser based devices and equipment for a wide variety of industrial, scientific, and medical applications. Some of the sites are concerned with a specific industry or quite narrow use, while many serve a fairly extensive range of markets. All, however, reflect an increasing advance in laser technology and products nowadays. Note: The emphasis in this category is on equipment rather than on the provision of job shop processing or cutting services. The category also excludes sites that are primarily focused on cutting or marking machinery or on the availability of entertainment and consumer products. Sites that can be so classified can be found -- and should be listed -- in the other categories that are shown as being @linked to this one. Additional note: A few companies that supply components and spare parts for the laser industry, can be found in the Business/Industries/Manufacturing/Optoelectronics category. In these cases, while they serve laser users, their full product range is broader in scope.

entries.title: Remote_Controls
entries.description: This category will list companies that manufacture remote controls and the companies that support them.

entries.title: Power_Supplies
entries.description: Includes listings for manufacturers of AC and DC power supplies, converters, inverters, batteries, and chargers.

entries.title: Alternating_Current
entries.description: Includes listings for manufacturers of AC power supplies, static inverters, frequency converters, line regulators and conditioners in a variety of configurations and types for commercial, industrial, bench, or laboratory use.

entries.title: Batteries
entries.description: Includes listings for manufacturers of primary and secondary (rechargeable) batteries and fuel cells, chargers, and accessories.

entries.title: Alkaline
entries.description: Includes listings for manufacturers of Alkaline batteries and accessories.

entries.title: Chargers
entries.description: Includes listings for battery charger manufacturers and accessories.

entries.title: Lead-Acid
entries.description: Includes listings for manufacturers of lead acid batteries.

entries.title: Lithium
entries.description: Includes listings for manufacturers of Lithium batteries and accessories.

entries.title: Nickel_Cadmium
entries.description: Includes listings for manufacturers of Nickel Cadmium batteries and accessories.

entries.title: Rechargeable
entries.description: Includes listings for manufacturers of rechargeable batteries and accessories. Battery rechargers are not listed in this category.

entries.description: Power supplies that are not available by a general power supply manufacturer.

entries.title: Direct_Current
entries.description: Includes listings for manufacturers of DC power supplies and DC to DC converters in various types and configurations such as single or multiple output, linear or switched mode, fixed or programmable, open frame, encapsulated, enclosed/modular, or lab or system supplies.

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: This category will list the companies and consultants that provide services to the manufacturers of power supplies.

entries.description: This category contains companies that primarily service the high voltage needs of OEM's. These companies primarily deal with high voltage supplies, suitable for industrial, medical, and accelerator systems. 07/10/00

entries.title: Inverters
entries.description: This category will list manufacturers of inverters and the companies that support these manufacturers.

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: This category will list the companies and consultants that provide services to the manufacturers of UPSs.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category will list companies that purchase products from Producers and Manufacturers in bulk and resell it without transformation to re-sellers. The Wholesalers and Distributors that will be listed in this category are associated with electronic power supplies. Companies that provide services to these Wholesalers and Distributors will be listed here. This category will not list Manufacturers' Representatives, Retailers.

entries.title: Production_Equipment_and_Materials
entries.description: This category will list the companies that produce equipment, materials and supplies that are used to manufacture electronic components. This includes companies that support these manufacturers.

entries.title: Materials_and_Supplies
entries.description: This category will list companies that manufacture or distribute materials or supplies used in the manufacture of electric and electronic devices.

entries.title: Solder_and_Flux
entries.description: This category will list the manufacturers and distributors of solder and flux that is used in the electronics industry.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Distributors of materials and supplies that are used in the manufacture of electronic goods and products.

entries.title: Tools_and_Equipment
entries.description: This category contains companies that design or manufacture equipment used to construct electrical or electronic products. The companies listed here primarily design devices that are meant for factory or laboratory settings.

entries.title: Automatic_Test_Systems
entries.description: This category will list companies that manufacture, sell and support Automated Test Systems used in the production of Electronic and Electrical devices.

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: This category will list Engineering firms that specialize in design of automated test systems for the electronics industry.

entries.title: Cleanroom

This includes but is not limited to manufacturers and sellers of air filtration systems, static dissipation flooring, cleanroom clothing and hand tools and companies that construct cleanrooms.

entries.title: Wipers
entries.description: This category was created for cleanroom wiper manufacturer and supplier. Also allowed duplicated listing. If a company make cleanroom wiper, the company can add the URL at this category and Production/Cleanroom/.

entries.title: Engineering
entries.description: This category will list the companies that design equipment and processes for the electronics industry.

entries.title: Environmental_Testing
entries.description: Includes manufacturers of environmental test equipment such as temperature controllers, plates, and test chambers, line and gas purging systems, precision baths, shock and space simulators, vacuum ovens, autoclaves, and burn-in chambers.

entries.title: Manufacturers_Representatives

entries.title: Probes_and_Accessories

entries.title: Soldering_and_Desoldering

entries.title: Static_Control

entries.title: Repair_and_Service
entries.description: This category is for businesses specifically involved in the repair and service of electronics equipment and systems offering services nationally or internationally. Local or regional repair facilities should not be located here, but should instead be submitted to the appropriate Regional category of the directory. Manufacturers and distributors should not be listed here, but in a category appropriate to their primary business instead.

entries.title: Safety_and_Compliance_Testing
entries.description: This category contains sites from companies that list products that deal with safety and compliance testing. Such as UL, or CE testing, including EMI and ECM emissions testing. This category also lists consultants for compliance testing.

entries.title: Engineering
