entries.description: Companies which plan, design and deal with carrier level voice and data communications solutions. Most companies in this category are often able to coordinate or sub-contract portions of the project to service providers and hardware suppliers to meet design requirements.

entries.title: Cost_Management
entries.description: Companies, not associated with carriers, which specialize in the reduction of telephone bills, usually by means of auditing and bill verification.

entries.title: Customer_Management
entries.description: Sites focused on ordering, billing, and customer care for customers of businesses offering telecommunications products and services.

entries.title: Directories
entries.description: Directories of sites offering telecommunications information and resources.

entries.title: Recruitment_and_Staffing
entries.description: This category contains sites which are retained Executive Search firms specializing in the placement of Telecommunications executives.

entries.title: Resumes
entries.description: Personal resumes for people in the telecommunications industry.

entries.title: Equipment
entries.description: Sites listed under this category are Manufacturers and Suppliers of telecom equipment and services.

entries.title: Amateur_and_CB_Radio
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of equipment designed specifically for the amateur radio market. Primarily the content of this category covers B2B sites. If your site is designed to sell directly to the consumer market your site should be placed in the <A HREF="/Shopping/Consumer_Electronics/Communications/Wireless/Radios/">Shopping</A> category. We also have a category for amateur radio enthusiasts. This can be found here: <A HREF="/Recreation/Radio/Amateur/">Amateur Radio</A>

entries.title: Citizens_Band
entries.description: Suppliers and manufacturers of unlicenced wireless radio systems including Citizen's Band (CB), and General Radio Service (GRS).

entries.title: Antennas
entries.description: Includes listings for manufacturers of antennas, field monitors, tuned cavities, waveguide, and related items.

entries.title: Broadband
entries.description: Web sites that manufacturer Broadband equipment.

entries.title: ATM
entries.description: Asynchronous Transfer Mode

entries.title: Business_Systems
entries.description: Web sites listed here are Suppliers of telecommunication hardware. Examples phone systems, cards and phones.

entries.title: Repairers_and_Refurbishers
entries.description: Sites about companies that primarily repair & refurbish telecommunications equipment for other companies or individuals. This equipment includes multiline phones, single line phones, cordless phones, system components, and add-on equipment such as voicemail, music on hold, and fax machines.

entries.title: Suppliers
entries.description: Sites about companies that specialize in buying and selling the types of equipment used in business systems. This equipment includes multiline phones, single line phones, cordless phones, system components, and add-on equipment such as voicemail, music on hold, and fax machines. Sites should be listed under under the Country the Company resides in if the subcategory exists.

entries.title: Vendors
entries.description: Web sites that sell and service and or Install Telephone System equipment. Generally for a certain area. (town, city, state or region)

entries.title: Central_Office
entries.description: Central Office Switching Systems: The underlying structure or framework of the telecommunications system (i.e. cable, switching equipment, amplifiers, etc.) which allows for the transmission of voice, video and data that is connected to or housed in the Central Office.(by way of wired or wireless)

entries.title: Manufacturing
entries.description: Sites listed here manufacture the components that work with and run the Central Office.

entries.title: Suppliers
entries.description: Web sites that supply Central Office equipment.

entries.title: Manufacturers
entries.description: Web sites listed here manufacture telephone accessories that work along with the telecommunication systems. Examples are sites that manufacture hardware installers use, jacks, blocks, connectors etc.

entries.title: Suppliers
entries.description: Web sites that Supply communications, networking and industrial products supplier generally for Vendors or Installers.

entries.title: Headsets_and_Handsets
entries.description: Manufacturers and or Suppliers of headsets and or handsets.

entries.title: Manufacturing
entries.description: Manufacturers of headsets and or handsets for telephones.

entries.title: Suppliers
entries.description: Suppliers of headsets and or handsets for telephones.

entries.title: Industrial_Data
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers, and service providers of wireless equipment used specifically for the transmission of industrial data. Typical applications will include telemetry, SCADA, and remote monitoring.

entries.title: Messaging
entries.description: Sites related to providing equipment to support telecommunications related messaging such as voice mail, paging systems, and on-hold message playback.

entries.title: On-Hold
entries.description: Manufacturers and or Suppliers in the US of Music-on-Hold or Promotion-on-Hold equipment.

entries.title: Paging
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers and suppliers of pagers and paging systems. Primarily the content of this category covers B2B sites. If your site is designed to sell directly to the consumer market your site should be placed in the <a href="/Shopping/Consumer_Electronics/Communications/Wireless/Pagers/">Shopping</a> category.

entries.title: Voicemail
entries.description: <html> <head> </head> <body> Sites that supply Voicemail equipment for the telecommunications industry. Not a category for Voicemail Services. For Voicemail Services see: <a href="/Computers/Data_Communications/Unified_Messaging/Services/"> Messaging Service</a> </body> </html>

entries.title: Microwave
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers and suppliers of microwave wireless systems, equipment, and component parts. In this instance microwave covers a generic frequency range from above 1 GHz to 30 GHz.

entries.title: Amplifiers
entries.description: An electrical device that strengthens the signal in an analog transmission.

entries.title: Components
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers and suppliers of RF and Microwave components designed specifically for the telecommunications wireless industry. If your product is for general applications please submit your site to <a href="/Business/Electronics_and_Electrical/Components/Microwave/">Electronics</A>

entries.title: Free_Space_Optical
entries.description: Fixed wireless telecommunications equipment that transmits and receives digital signals over the air (free space) between two points, using either LEDs or laser beams. Used to quickly deploy a communications link between two locations, with clear line of sight, at speeds up to a gigabit. In most areas of the world, high availability link performance is limited to less than a kilometer.

entries.title: Radios
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of analog and digital microwave radios. Typical applications include ISP and corporate network connections, LMDS, cellular, and PCS infrastructure, point to multipoint, last mile network access, and wireless local loop.

entries.title: Multiple_Products
entries.description: Web sites for companies that supply telecommunications hardware accessories (i.e., intercom, voicemail, answering machines, auto dialers, etc). This category is not for telephone systems suppliers. It is for suppliers of accessories and peripheral telecom products.

entries.title: Satellite
entries.description: This category is for manufactures and suppliers of satellite systems, equipment, and parts used within the commercial telecommunications industry. Satellite equipment sold directly to the consumer market should be listed in one of the following categories: <A HREF="/Arts/Television/Satellite/Digital_Satellite_Systems/"> Arts/Television/Satellite/Digital_Satellite_Systems<A> or <A HREF="/Shopping/Consumer_Electronics/Digital_Satellite/"> Shopping/Consumer_Electronics/Digital_Satellite<A>

entries.title: Pay_Phones
entries.description: Sites listed here manufacture, supply and or sell pay telephones and pay telephone products.

entries.title: Wired_Phones
entries.description: Telephone Manufacturers and accessories. Main focus on Telephones.

entries.title: Wireless_Phones
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and renters of mobile telephones and accessories, both cellular and cordless. The category has been divided into a number of sub categories and submitters are asked to take the time to review the structure before placing their submissions. Primarily the content of this category covers B2B sites. If your site is designed to sell directly to the consumer market your site should be placed in the <A HREF="/Shopping/Consumer_Electronics/Communications/Wireless/Cellular_Phones/">Shopping</A> category. Sites dealing with consumer information and advice should be submitted to the <A HREF="/Home/Consumer_Information/Electronics/Communications/Phones/Cell/">Consumer Advice</A> category. Sites dealing with issues and safety should be submitted to the <A HREF="/Society/Issues/Science_and_Technology/Cell_Phones/">Issues </A> category. Sites dealing with equipment specific to the WAP market should be submitted to the <A HREF="/Computers/Mobile_Computing/Wireless_Data/WAP/Devices/">WAP Devices</A> category.

entries.title: Accessories
entries.description: This category lists businesses that either manufacture or supply accessories for wireless phones.

entries.title: Testing
entries.description: Web sites listed here are designers, manufacturers of testing equipment for the telecommunication Industry.

entries.title: Wireless
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and service companies of test equipment specific to the wireless communications industry. Sites dealing with more general telecommunication test equipment should be submitted to the <A HREF="/Business/Telecommunications/Equipment/Suppliers/Hardware_Accessories/Testers_and_Tools/">Testers and Tools</A> category. Sites dealing with more general electronics testing equipment should be submitted to the <A HREF="/Business/Electronics_and_Electrical/Test_and_Measurement/"> Electronics Testing</A> category.

entries.title: Towers
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers, suppliers and service companies of communication towers. The category has been divided into a number of sub categories and we ask submitters to take the time to review these categories before placing their sites.

entries.title: Lighting
entries.description: This category is for manufacturers of lighting equipment specifically designed for communication towers. Sites dealing with more general lighting equipment should be submitted to the <A HREF="/Business/Construction_and_Maintenance/Materials_and_Supplies/Electrical/Lighting/"> Electrical Lighting</A> category.

entries.title: Wireless
entries.description: This category is for equipment used within the wireless communications industry. It is for manufacturers, suppliers, and those companies which provide a range of services related to wireless equipment. The category has been divided into a number of sub categories and submitters are asked to take the time to review the structure before placing their submissions. Primarily the content of this category covers B2B sites. If your site is designed to sell directly to the consumer market your site should be placed in the <A HREF="/Shopping/Consumer_Electronics/Communications/Wireless/">Shopping</A> category. We also have a category for amateur radio enthusiasts. This can be found here: <A HREF="/Recreation/Radio//">Amateur Radio</A> In addition there are a number of related subjects. Links to these categories can be found in the related categories section appended to the main category and its sub categories.

entries.title: Cellular_Network
entries.description: Manufacturers of equipment for mainstream cellular networks. This includes GSM family (GSM, UMTS, HSPA, LTE), CDMA family (IS-95, EV-DO, cdmaOne), iDEN, NMT, PDC. It excludes wireless data standards such as 802.11 series.

entries.title: In-Building
entries.description: Equipment vendors for in-building wireless systems for voice and/or data. These can be proprietary or standards based.

entries.title: Location_and_Tracking
entries.description: This category is for companies which provide Location Based Services for example : 1. Location based information 2. Location sensitive billing 3. Emergency services 4. Tracking

entries.title: Technology
entries.description: For sites about providers of technology to the location and tracking industry.

entries.title: Vehicle
entries.description: Vehicle location and tracking involves providing information about a vehicle's location to a remote user, such as a dispatch center. Information is delivered by means of radio systems or other wireless carriers. Depending on the system, information other than location may be provided, as well as the ability of people at the remote location to communicate with people in the vehicle.

entries.title: Equipment
entries.description: Sites that manufacturer or supply vehicle locating and tracking equipment.

entries.title: Fleet_Management_Services
entries.description: For sites that offer the service of vehicle location and tracking.

entries.title: Marketplaces
entries.description: E-commerce marketplaces facilitate interactions and transactions between buyers and sellers within a specific industry or industries. This category is for sites that deal exclusively with the Telecommunications industry.

entries.title: News_and_Media
entries.description: Online and printed sources of news and analysis covering the telecommunications industry.

entries.title: Regulation
entries.description: A type of delegated legislation regarding the Telecommunications industry promulgated by a governmental administrative agency given authority to do so by the appropriate legislature. Regulations generally are very specific in nature and are sometimes referred to as rules or administrative law.

entries.title: Agencies
entries.description: Sites of governmental agencies charged with regulating the Telecommunications industry.

entries.title: Licensing
entries.description: Sites providing information on licensing in the Telecommunications industry.

entries.title: Resources
entries.description: For informational resources focused on telecommunications, and for sites that provide a comprehensive overview of the telecommunications field.

entries.title: Numbering
entries.description: Sources of information on the history and development of worldwide public telephone numbering plans.

entries.title: Phone_Rate_Comparisons
entries.description: Phone Rate Comparisons contains sites offering objective comparisons of different phone plans.

entries.title: Tariffs
entries.description: Tariffs give comprehensive details of telecommunication company rate and fee filings with various governmental agencies including the FCC and state Public Utility Commissions.

entries.title: Safety
entries.description: A listing of sites providing information on radio frequency safety.

entries.title: Services
entries.description: <p>The <b>Telecommunications: Services </b> category focuses on businesses engaged in <ul> <li>providing telecommunications services.</li> <li>providing goods, services, or information specific to one of the listed subcategories. </ul>

entries.title: Callback
entries.description: Callback providers offer either web initiated or phone call initiated (with quick disconnect) long distance connections - bypassing the costs of direct dialing in countries that have high connection charges by originating the call in a less expensive telecom market.

entries.title: Voice
entries.description: Voice conferencing providers offer multiple customers the opportunity to interact over phone or internet using their voice.

entries.title: Dial-Around
entries.description: This category is for providers that specialize in long-distance dial-around telecommunications services. These services require dialing a provider's access code prior to dialing a long-distance number in order to bypass the consumer's own long-distance carrier, usually to get a better rate.

entries.title: Direct_Dial_Long_Distance
entries.description: This area is devoted to long distance providers and services.

entries.title: Messaging
entries.description: This category is for providers of telecommunication messaging services that facilitate the transmission of messages to a designated party. This message transmission can be ad-hock, or scheduled, and is typically implemented in some sort of automated fashion. The form or nature of the messages whether voice, fax, or text is not important, however the underlying transmission technology should be telecommunications related.

entries.title: Fax
entries.description: This category will list providers of telecommunication services related to fax solutions.

entries.title: Paging
entries.description: A listing of all carriers, suppliers, manufacturers, and resellers of paging services. This includes numeric, alphanumeric, data, 1 way, 1.5 way, and 2 way paging services across all spectrums (low band, VHF, UHF, 900MHz, etc.).

entries.title: Phone_Cards
entries.description: This category is for businesses who only sell phone cards. Sites which offer additional long distance services are found in: <A HREF="/Business/Telecommunications/Communications_Providers/Long_Distance_Calling/"> Business/Telecommunications/Communications_Providers/Long_Distance_Calling/<A>

entries.title: VoIP
entries.description: Providers offering voice communication using VOIP (Voice over internet protocol). These services include PC-Phone, Peer to Peer, and analog-digital telephone adaptor services.

entries.title: Wireless
entries.description: Sites whose primary focus is the business of providing wireless-related telecommunications services. Appropriate sites include ones related to service providers, trade associations, software makers, consultants, education, training, conferences and media.

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: A listing of professional organizations and trade associations serving the wireless communications industry.

entries.title: Cellular_Network
entries.description: Business sites whose primary focus is to provide cellular related telecommunications services. Appropriate sites include ones related to service providers, trade associations and cellular equipment providers.

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: Cellular Network Associations

entries.title: Network_Systems
entries.description: Category for telco system providers relating to networks, MSCs,BSSs etc

entries.title: Providers
entries.description: Business sites whose primary focus is to provide value added telecommunications services. Appropriate sites include ones related to value added service providers to carriers.

entries.title: Consulting
entries.description: Wireless Consultants are firms or corporations that provide impartial advice to other businesses or retail customers in deciding which wireless services are best for them.

entries.title: Education_and_Training
entries.description: A listing of sites for companies and organizations providing training facilities for those employed within the wireless industry. Sites which provide services to the telecommunications industry as a whole should be submitted to the <A HREF="/Business/Telecommunications/Education_and_Training/">Telecommunications</A> category.

entries.title: Resources
entries.description: For informational resources focused on wireless telecommunications services, and for sites that provide a comprehensive overview of this field.

entries.title: 3G
entries.description: All sites regarding the 3G Network are to go here.

entries.title: Mobile_Phone_Unlocking_and_Repairs
entries.description: All sites which are about Mobile Phone Unlocking and repairing.

entries.title: Satellite
entries.description: Sites whose primary focus is the business of providing satellite-related telecommunications services. Appropriate sites include ones related to service providers, trade associations, software makers, consultants, education, training, conferences and media.

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: Associations sites about the Satellite Industry.

entries.title: Providers
entries.description: Providers of satellite telecommunications services.

entries.title: Software
entries.description: Businesses which offer software products that support the enterprise and carrier telecommunications industries.

entries.title: PBX
entries.description: Software PBX (Private Branch Exchange - aka Telephone Exchanges) products. The term PBX is rather archaic but is used here generically to include VoIP (Voice over Internet Protocol). Also included is hardware specifically designed to interface to virtual PBXs. The terms Virtual PBX and Software PBX can also refer to services which remove the PBX mechanism offsite, these are not covered in this category which is specifically for software which emulates a PBX and would normally be used onsite. Other related categories are Computers/Internet/Protocols/SIP and Computers/Software/Operating_Systems/Linux/Networking/VoIP

entries.title: Two-Way_Radio
entries.description: Also known as LMR or Land Mobile radio, two-way radio provides the mobile communications needs of businesses worldwide. This is not an amateur or Family Radio, cb radio area. Do NOT send URL suggestions or updates to editors. Use the Add URL or Update URL links from the category page instead. Thank you. If you know a web site that would make a good addition to this area, please submit it by going to the appropriate sub-category and at the top of the page click "Add URL." Suggestions for new categories or other comments are welcome.

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: Organizations representing various segments of the mobile communications industry.

entries.title: Data
entries.description: Links to web sites of companies and information involved in mobile data. This category is primarily concerned with products integrated into a two-way radio system. Stand alone products, and products using public wireless networks should be submitted to Computers: Data Communications: Wireless.

entries.title: Mobile_Data
entries.description: Links to web sites of companies and information involved in mobile data. This category is primarily concerned with products integrated into a two-way radio system. Stand alone products, and products using public wireless networks should be submitted to Computers: Data Communications: Wireless.

entries.title: Agencies
entries.description: Web pages of agencies that provide Emergency Communications.

entries.title: Dealers
entries.description: Dealers of two way radio equipment and related products and services are listed by region in which they are located. A dealer is a firm that primarily sells equipment and services directly to the end user.

entries.title: Dispatch
entries.description: This category lists vendors of consoles, remote controls and other equipment related to the dispatch function of a two way radio system.

entries.title: Manufacturing
entries.description: Manufacturers of radios and related equipment.

entries.title: Manufacturer's_Representatives
entries.description: These companies represent manufacturers to dealers. Great sources of information. Manufacturer's Representative do not primarily sell from their own inventory. They maintain the relationship between dealers and manufacturers.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: Firms whose primary business is selling products to dealers. Distributors stock inventory and ship direct to the dealer.

entries.title: Mailing_Lists
entries.description: Join these mailing lists and discuss radio related issues. Get help on questions. Buy and sell equipment.

entries.title: Software
entries.description: Sources of software of interest to those in the Two Way Radio industry. This might include software that is involved with radio communications, radio data, radio business management, and radio engineering.

entries.title: Textiles_and_Nonwovens

translations.tha: สิ่งทอและผ้าใยสังเคราะห์

entries.description: <p>The <b>Textiles and Nonwovens</b> industry category comprises entities involved in the manufacture, distribution, and marketing of textile and nonwoven products.</p> <p><b>Sites generally <u>not listed</u> in this category:</b></p> <ul> <li>Manufacturers, suppliers, etc. involved in the clothing industry are organized in <a href="/Business/Consumer_Goods_and_Services/Clothing/">Business: Consumer Goods and Services: Clothing</a>.</li> <li>Sites whose aim is to sell products online are listed in <a href="/Shopping/Clothing/">Shopping: Clothing</a> and other Shopping categories</a>.</li> </ul>

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: This category lists trade and professional associations, related to the textile and nonwovens industries only.

entries.title: Consulting
entries.description: This category lists consultancies to the textile and nonwovens industries only.

entries.title: Directories
entries.description: This category lists directories for the textile, clothing and garment accessories, and nonwovens industries.

entries.title: Dyestuffs_and_Chemicals
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of chemical intermediates, and fiber, textile and nonwovens processing and finishing resins, chemicals, adhesives, compounds and additives only.

entries.title: Adhesives
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of hot- and coldmelt adhesives, adhesive compounds and additives only.

entries.title: Chemicals
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of textile processing and finishing chemicals and compounds only.

entries.title: Diversified
entries.description: This category lists companies involved in the manufacture of a range of chemicals for textile and nonwovens processing and finishing applications.

entries.title: Leather_Processing
entries.description: This category lists companies involved in leather tanning chemicals.

entries.title: Care_and_Restoration
entries.description: This category lists companies involved in the manufacture and trade in chemical products for leather care, maintenance and restoration applications.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category lists companies involved in the bulk supply of chemicals, dyes and pigments for the leather tanning, processing and finishing industries.

entries.title: Sizing_Chemicals
entries.description: This category lists companies involved in the manufacture and trade in sizing chemicals for yarns and fabrics.

entries.title: Wax_Rolls
entries.description: This category lists companies involved in the manufacture and trade of wax rolls and products for yarn lubrication applications in textile knitting and weaving operations.

entries.title: Dyestuffs_and_Inks
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of dyestuffs, pigments, inks and related products for the textile printing and finishing industry.

entries.title: Inks_and_Pigments
entries.description: This category lists companies involved in the manufacture and trade in inks and pigments for textile and garment printing applications.

entries.title: News_and_Media
entries.description: This category lists publications related to textile chemicals, resins, adhesives and dyes only.

entries.title: Resources
entries.description: This category lists sites from research institutes and companies, active in chemical and polymer science and development related to the natural and man-made fiber processing industries, as well as informational resources of interest to these industries.

entries.title: Conductive_Polymers
entries.description: This category lists scientific paper, studies and articles dealing with conductive polymers.

entries.title: Research
entries.description: This category lists government and privately independent institutions and organizations that are involved in research and development activities related to textile and nonwovens dyestuffs, resins and chemicals.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category lists wholesale distributors of chemicals, dyestuffs and inks for industrial uses.

entries.title: Education_and_Training
entries.description: This category lists textile and nonwovens, and related departments of universities, colleges and private institutions, only. Please, note that the title of the listing is the official name of the institution. A short description specifies the department or courses to which the listed URL will lead.

entries.title: Employment
entries.description: This category lists companies and individuals, specializing in the search for, and placement of, professionals in the textile and nonwovens and related industries only.

entries.title: Feathers_and_Down
entries.description: This category lists processors of feathers and down products for the bedding, upholstery and garment industries.

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: This category lists national and international trade and industry organizations involved in the feather and down industry.

entries.title: Fibers
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of natural and man-made fibers used for the production of yarns, nonwovens and composite products.

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: This category lists trade organizations for the natural and man-made fiber industries.

entries.title: Man-made
entries.description: From very simple beginnings, man-made fiber production has developed into a sophisticated, versatile and innovative industry. Today, not many roads are being build without the use of some kind of fiber substrate, there is no easy chair that isn't stuffed with fiber and no one is going to walk into space if the suit isn't made up with the help of engineered nonwoven fabrics. The Fiber Producers category's main page lists companies which manufacture a variety of fibers from different kinds of polymer compounds, and cannot be placed further down in the directory without doing injustice to the company or confusing the viewer. In the sub-categories, you will find links to companies dedicated to the manufacture of a specific fiber, or for which the production of that fiber is its main business.

entries.title: Acrylic
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of acrylic and related fibers only.

entries.title: Bi-Component_Fibers
entries.description: This category lists companies which are primarily involved in the development and manufacture of bi-component fibers of various constructions and polymers.

entries.title: Carbon
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of carbon and related fibers only.

entries.title: Cellulose_and_Viscose
entries.description: This category lists companies dedicated to the manufacture of cellulosic, cellulose and viscose fibers, or for which the production of these fibers is their main business.

entries.title: Conductive_Fibers
entries.description: This category lists companies involved in the development, manufacture and marketing of electro-conductive fibers.

entries.title: Flock_Fibers
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of specialty fibers for flocking (electrostatic or pneumatic fiber coating) technologies only.

entries.title: Glass_Fiber
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of glass fiber for textile and nonwovens applications, or for which glass fiber manufacture is their main product.

entries.title: Metal_Fibers
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of metal fibers for textile and nonwovens applications only.

entries.title: Mineral_Fibers
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of mineral fibers only.

entries.title: Nanofibers
entries.description: This category lists companies involved in the research, development and manufacture of electrospun polimeric nano-scale fibers for textile, nonwoven and composite manufacturing processes.

entries.title: Polyamide
entries.description: This category lists companies dedicated to the manufacture of polyamide and related fibers, or for which the production of these fibers is their main business.

entries.title: Polyester
entries.description: This category lists companies dedicated to the manufacture of polyester fibers, or for which the production of these fibers is their main business.

entries.title: Polyolefins
entries.description: This category lists companies dedicated to the manufacture of polyolefin and related fibers, or for which the production of these fibers is their main business.

entries.title: Spinning_Technology
entries.description: This category lists technical papers, studies and articles pertaining to the technology of man-made fiber spinning.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category lists wholesale distributors of man-made fibers for industrial textile and nonwovens applications only.

entries.title: Natural
entries.description: Natural fibers are quickly becoming an important source of raw materials for the nonwovens industry. The obvious reason for that is the growing concern about the ecological dangers (real or imagined, I'm not going to get into that one), processing of chemicals is posing to the environment. But there are a number of other incentives for nonwovens manufacturers, to make use of renewable sources like plant and bast fibers. First of all because, with care and good management, they're always available. Sometimes it's just plain good economics. Products made from natural fibers are rapidly growing in popularity, despite the usually higher retail prices. I, for instance (if I am allowed a personal confession in the framework of this project), will not be caught dead in a polyester shirt. So, this is what this category will be about. Links to companies that make the fibers from weed, tree or plant, for other companies to make my shirts from them.

entries.title: Bamboo
entries.description: This category lists companies involved in the bamboo fiber industry.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category lists companies involved in the trade and distribution of bamboo fiber.

entries.title: Chitosan_Fiber
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of chitosan fiber for the textile yarn spinning industry.

entries.title: Coir
entries.description: This category lists processors of coir fiber for industrial applications.

entries.title: Cotton
entries.description: This category lists growers and/or processors of cotton fibers only.

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: Trade associations for cotton marketers, producers, etc.

entries.title: Import_and_Export
entries.description: This category lists traders of raw cotton.

entries.title: Flax
entries.description: This category lists processors of flax fiber for industrial applications.

entries.title: Import_and_Export
entries.description: This category lists companies involved in the international trade in flax fiber.

entries.title: Hemp
entries.description: This category lists processors of hemp fiber for industrial applications.

entries.title: Import_and_Export
entries.description: This category lists companies involved in the international trade of animal and plant fibers.

entries.title: Bast_Fibers
entries.description: This category lists companies involved in the trade of jute, hemp, kenaf, sisal and similar fibers derived from the basts of plants and trees.

entries.title: Wool
entries.description: <p>This category lists companies involved in the international wool trade, including brokers, those that primarily export or primarily import raw wool for further processing.</p>

entries.title: Kenaf
entries.description: This category lists processors of kenaf fiber for industrial applications.

entries.title: Articles_and_Studies
entries.description: This category lists articles, lectures and web sites, providing information on the properties and uses of natural fibers only.

entries.title: Kenaf
entries.description: This category lists articles, studies and technical papers about kenaf fiber for textile, nonwovens and composite materials processes.

entries.title: Silk
entries.description: This category lists technical papers and articles about silk.

entries.title: Organizations
entries.description: This category contains links to web sites of governmental and industrial organizations involved with natural fibers.

entries.title: Research
entries.description: This category lists companies and institutes involved in research and development activities in natural fibers.

entries.title: Soybean_Protein
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers of fibers for the textile yarn spinning industry, produced from protein materials.

entries.title: News_and_Media
entries.description: This category lists publications related to natural and man-made fibers for the textile and nonwovens industries only.

entries.title: Recycling
entries.description: This category lists companies which' primary business is recycling of textile waste products into reusable fiber for the textile and nonwovens industries. Companies, collecting and processing textile waste and used clothing for reuse as is, or as wiping materials, are listed in Business/Industries/Waste Management/Recycling or in Business/Industries/Wholesale/Matrials/Wipes and Rags/

entries.title: Articles_and_Studies
entries.description: This category contains links to articles, technical papers, scientific studies and lectures about the history of natural and man-made fibers.

entries.title: On-Line_Books
entries.description: This category contains links to full-text free of copywright historical books and papers about textile fiber science, technolofies, production and trade.

entries.title: Geotechnical
entries.description: This category lists manufacturers and installers of geofabrics, membranes, structures and complete systems for construction, civil engineering and environmental applications, incorporating textile and nonwoven fabrics. Please, do not submit sites with a more general textile or nonwovens content here. Thank you for your cooperation. Henk J. Sies Editor ODP Textiles and Nonwovens

entries.title: Fabrication_and_Installation
entries.description: This category lists fabricators and installers of geotextiles, geomembranes and complete geosystems for civil engineering and environmental projects.

entries.title: Resources
entries.description: This category lists informative and scientific articles dealing primarily with woven and nonwoven fabrics for geotechnical applications.

entries.title: Geosynthetic_Clay_Liners
entries.description: This category lists technical papers, studies and articles pertaining to geosynthetic clay liners (GCLs).

entries.title: Geotextiles
entries.description: This category lists technical papers, studies and articles related to geotextiles.

entries.title: Wholesale_and_Distribution
entries.description: This category lists wholesalers, distributors and manufacturers representatives of geosynthetic fabrics, products and materials for civil and environmental engineering only.

entries.title: Import_and_Export
entries.description: This category is a holding place for links to import and export sub-categories throughout Textiles and Nonwovens. No sites will be listed here. Please, select the link appropriate to your company and submit there.

entries.title: Industrial_Yarns_and_Sewing_Threads

translations.ron: Fire industriale şi ace de cusut

entries.description: This category lists MANUFACTURERS of yarns for weaving and knitting processes, and sewing and embroidery threads for industrial purposes only. This entry page lists manufacturers which spin a variety of yarns from blends of natural and synthetic fibers. For a more specific listing, please scroll down and submit your site to the category most appropriate for your business.

entries.title: Associations
entries.description: This category lists trade organizations for the industrial yarn manufacturing and distributing industries.

entries.title: Carpet_Yarns

entries.title: Nonwovens
entries.description: There are thousands of companies that manufacture products from fibers without utilizing any weaving, knitting or moulding technologies, which is why those products cannot be called textiles, plastics or papers. They use one or another, or a mixture of several nonwoven technologies, and they are making nonwoven products. For an excellent description of the various technologies in use with the nonwovens industry, please go to: http://www.edana.org/story.cfm?section=|edana_nonwovens&story=making.xml This main page will not list sites. If your company applies more than one manufacturing technology, please submit your site in Diversified Technologies to the regional sub-category which suites your company. Companies which utilise one main technology should submit to the proper sub-category available. Thank you for your cooperation.

entries.title: Machinery_and_Equipment
entries.description: Without the great efforts of machine and equipment manufacturers, to provide the nonwovens industry with innovative solutions in order to improve production efficiency and versatility, we would probably all still be producing carpet underlays. The financial and intellectual investments put into the mechanics of making nonwovens, have made the growth of the nonwovens industry into one of the most dynamic and sophisticated industries a fact of today's life. This category lists nonwovens machinery and auxiliary equipment manufacturers only.

entries.title: Transportation_and_Logistics
entries.description: The <b>Transportation and Logistics </b>sector category includes industries providing transportation of people, cargo, goods, merchandise and products by land, air or sea. Also included in this category are industries and companies engaged in importing and exporting, customs brokers, packing, warehousing, and storage. <ul> <li>Scientific, technical and research oriented sites are listed under <a href="/Science/Technology/Transportation/">Science/Technology/Transportation/</a></li> <li>Sites dealing with the social and public policy aspects of transportation are listed under <a href="/Society/Issues/Transportation/">Society/Issues/Transportation/</a></li> <li>Hobbist sites and other transportation sites of recreational interest are listed under the Recreation branch (e.g., <a href="/Recreation/Boating/">Recreation/Boating/</a>,<a href="/Recreation/Roads_and_Highways/"> Recreation/Roads_and_Highways/</a> and <a href="/Recreation/Trains_and_Railroads/">Recreation/Trains_and_Railroads/</a> ).</li> <li>Industries involved in the manufacturing, distribution, and sales of automotive products and services are listed under <a href="/Business/Automotive/">Business/Automotive/</a>. However, industries providing transportation services via automobiles, trucks, buses, etc. are listed in the Transportation and Logistics category.</li> </ul> <br> <p align=center> <table bgcolor="#ffffcc" cellpadding=6 border="0"> <tr><td> <small>Before submitting your site, please review the <a href="/Business/desc.html">Guidelines for Submitting a Site</a>.</small> </td></tr> </table> </p>

entries.title: Armored_Car_Service

entries.title: Aviation
entries.description: Resources related to companies operating commercial passenger and cargo transportation by air. The category features aviation transport businesses and organizations, as well as those providing supplies and services to this industry. Recreational aviation sites are listed in the <a href="/Recreation/Aviation/">different category</a>.

entries.title: Acquisition
entries.description: This category is for sites that deal with the acquisition/sales of business aircraft. This can range from crop sprayers to airliners.

entries.title: Fractional_Ownership

entries.title: Management
entries.description: This category is for companies offering aircraft management services. This can range from simple maintenance management, to almost a complete charter service.

entries.title: Airports
entries.description: This category is for airports and their operation, passenger services, and issues relating to them. <P> Only web sites that have information on multiple airports thoroughout the world will be accepted into this category. If the site that you are submitting is about a specific airport please submit to the appropriate region or country subcategory. <P> <font color=red> Sites on aviation, airplanes, maintenance, navigation, piloting, and fixed based operators (FBOs) should be submitted to the proper subcategory under the <a href="/Business/Transportation_and_Logistics/Aviation/"> Aviation</a> category.</font> <P>Websites in this category must be in English.

entries.title: Codes
entries.description: This category is for listings of airport codes, either IATA or ICAO, or both, for any given country, region, or for the world.

entries.title: Directories
entries.description: This category will list web sites that contain alphabetical or classified lists of resources covering Airports. This category will also list Guides that provide information on this subject that goes beyond simple listing and description.

entries.title: Products
entries.description: This category is for websites on products used in airports, such as lighting, passenger ticket and data management, safety, and security, among others. <P> Websites submitted here must be airport product related and <b>in English</b>. Bilingual sites are acceptable however sites only in other languages should be submitted to the appropriate <a href="/World/"> World subcategory</a>.

entries.title: Services
entries.description: This category is for websites on services offered at airports for passengers and cargo. <P> Websites submitted here must be airport service related and <b>in English</b>. Bilingual sites are acceptable however sites only in other languages should be submitted to the appropriate <a href="/World/"> World subcategory</a>.
